The staff were friendly and attentive, making sure our experience was exceptional from start to finish. I highly recommend this place for anyone looking to unwind by the beach in style. text: Came here this year with my little family and friends with families. Got the room on the ground floor. It was really clean and smells very nice. Just that it’d be nice if there’s a water pipe at every stairs so that people can wash their feet off from the sand. To prevent the room full of sand. And this time around the breakfast was not very nice like last year’s spread. The nasi lemak was good though last year. This year a bit disappointing. The bbq at Royal Chulan Villa was worth it. Just that it would be nice if they have like more type of fish  and seafood. I would like to suggest if they can do it like Ana Ikan Bakar Petai but with more petai. I mean variety of food lah basically. Because the dessert selection was meh. But others are nice especially the broccoli soup and the mash. It was so gooood !!!!! Best part was we ate in an air conditioned room. That was sooooo worth it. By the way, this review is for Royal Chulan Cherating Chalet

text: Location wise is convenient and the hotel under renovation partially. Stayed there while their restaurant out of order and going for temporary breakfast. Overall many foreign tourist staying over there.

name: Ainsley Chan
text:
I stayed here for a 5 day church camp.

Meal staff were very alert with collecting dishes. Low-key I was scared because I'd leave a dish on the table to go get some more food, and they'd clear my plate. I'd regret a little because of food wastage + extra dishes for them to wash for no reason.

Poolside one-armed guy was very friendly with the kids. He'd go around helping them pick up balls and encouraging them on their swimming.

The big hall underneath the swimming pool has a chlorine smell for some reason. Air conditioning is always very cold, so those from cold countries will like it.

It'd be nice if they used charcoal / natural sprays instead of those overly fragranced room sprays because my nose gets assaulted every time I return to the room hallways. The air is very dry too, which makes it worse.

Overall it's a good hotel to stay in. For the price and level of service (all the staff are very polite and the security will always open the door for you), it's a good place to stay in. Walkable distance to many tourist spots too. Everything I wrote above is just my nitpicking and I think their staff are all very hardworking.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: - Centrally located in George Town, the hotel is within walking distance to major attractions like Chew Jetty, Fort Cornwallis, and Little India.  - The spacious and elegant rooms featuring colonial-style decor, large windows, and modern amenities such as air-conditioning, flat-screen TVs, minibars, and free Wi-Fi. - The hotel offers an outdoor pool with a separate kiddie pool, jakuzi a full-service spa- Staff Serriendly and helpful staff, nothing their professionalism and attentiveness.  - very big breakfast and more variety

name: Jr Brian Hogan
text:
Strategic location.
1) From the hotel, you can walk to Kidzania within 15 minutes. There was a link bridge that connects the hotel to the Curve Mall via MRT but it was closed during my visit. Hence my family and I have to walk by the roadside (still shaded but you might get wet if it rains) from the hotel to Curve Mall. The Curve Mall is connected to Curve NX (where Kidzania is located) and IPC Shopping Centre (IKEA building) via link bridge so you would find it convenient to go both places.
2) the hotel is around 10 minutes taxi ride to Tropicana Gardens Mall where you can visit Just Farm (indoor animal farm with Alpaca and other animals)
3) the hotel is around 35 minutes taxi ride to Petrosains Discovery Centre at KLCC
4) approximately 20 minutes taxi ride to 99 Wonderland Park

I brought my family to visit all those places above during our stay at the hotel. What a convenience.
Want it to be more convenient for you to go to Kidzania and IKEA? Stay at Royal Chulan The Curve. That hotel is directly connected to the Curve Mall and you can easily access IKEA and Kidzania from there, via the mentioned link bridges.
title: Royale Chulan Damansara

name: Haider5788
text:
Pulau Penang dikenal sebagai "Mutiara dari Timur" (Pearl of the Orient) dan juga sebagai surga kuliner di Malaysia. Selain itu, pulau ini terkenal dengan warisan budaya yang kaya, destinasi wisata alam yang memukau, serta berbagai atraksi modern.

Jika Anda memiliki kesempatan untuk mengunjungi Penang, saya sangat merekomendasikan untuk menginap di Hotel Royale Chulan Penang. Lokasinya sangat strategis, memungkinkan kita untuk menjelajahi keindahan dan estetika kota Penang hanya dengan berjalan kaki dari hotel.

Saya disambut hangat oleh Security yang membukakan pintu utama dengan salam dan senyuman terbaiknya. Kesan pertama saat memasuki lobi hotel sangat menyenangkan
udara harum, ruang yang luas, serta minuman selamat datang yang telah disediakan. Proses check-in pun berlangsung cepat, dengan staf yang ramah dan memberikan pelayanan dengan sepenuh hati.

Sayangnya, kamar yang saya tempati tidak memiliki pemandangan yang menarik. Namun, kamarnya cukup luas, kamar mandi juga besar, dan fasilitas yang disediakan sangat lengkap. Tersedia kolam renang, pusat kebugaran (gym), serta pilihan menu sarapan yang beragam dan lezat.

Rasanya, setiap kali saya kembali ke Penang, saya akan memilih untuk menginap di hotel ini lagi.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

Aircond was cold, pillows were nice and fluffy, definitely helped in our good night sleep. We tried the in house room dining and it was worth the price. Pool was nice and we enjoyed the slide. Breakfast choices were good for us. There were various food and it was topped up the moment it finished. Checkout process was smooth and we were done in less than 5 minutes. Thank you RCS and we will definitely come back again.

name: Ammar Roslan
text:
We had a lovely family stay at Royale Chulan Damansara. The location is very strategic — just next to IPC and The Curve, which makes it super convenient for shopping and food. The room was spacious, clean, and comfortable for our family with young kids.

What really stood out was the staff — everyone was polite and helpful from check-in to check-out. The breakfast spread was decent with a good mix of local and Western choices.

The pool area was clean and kid-friendly, which was a big plus for us. Parking was also easy and accessible.

Overall, a great hotel for a weekend staycation or short trip with the family. Would definitely consider coming back again.

name: HC Lew
text:
i made the booking couple days earlier. Upon arrival, I was held up for half to an hour at check-in. After finally being checked in, the staff did not inform me about a problem with the payment voucher from the Agoda. Over the next few hours, I received multiple calls asking for the same information. On the last call, I was told that my confirmation email and booking ID were invalid, and I was told that I had been scammed. They insisted that I pay as a walk-in customer instead.

Despite Royale Chulan Hotel confirming that Agoda is one of their partners, they refused to contact Agoda to resolve the issue. I was left to handle the situation on my own. I called Agoda’s customer service, who confirmed that my booking was valid and paid. The operator assured me that the issue had been sorted out with Chulan Hotel and would be settled in two hours. However, the hotel still insisted that I pay as a walk-in guest.

Chulan Hotel deemed the emails and details I showed them as invalid, even though I had made an official customer service call and received confirmation from the Agoda app. By 10 PM, I was still trying to resolve the issue, and on my last call with Agoda, I was told it would be resolved within 24 to 48 hours — but I was due to check out within 8 hours.

This entire experience was incredibly frustrating. I believe both Agoda and Chulan Hotel need to improve communication and liaise properly with their partners. It is unacceptable for a customer to be charged twice due to internal miscommunication.

As for the hotel itself, I would rate it a 1-star experience. The facilities were not up to standard. There were no bath towels readily available, shampoo is empty, the cleanliness was lacking, and the room had two single beds placed together, which essentially made it feel like a queen-sized bed.

name: Trip.com Member
text: Bad service. It was supposed to be a stay that my wife and I would enjoy as newlyweds yet smeared by poor housekeeping services on some aspects as I have explained below:1. Unwanted Housekeeping - We were getting ready for our afternoon wedding reception when we had made sure to not switch on the housekeeping indicator because we had left some of our items unattended in the room. As we got back to the room later that evening, we discovered that housekeeping was done and our belongings had been rearranged without our consent. Despite nothing was missing, it made us feel anxious prior to checking and upon finding out someone went into our room without consent.2. Unprofessional and Untimely Housekeeping Services - After we had just got back to our room from our wedding reception only to discover that the unwanted housekeeping had not provided a fresh bath towel to replace the ones they took away. I had called the reception to request for new ones but we eventually had to wait for more than 2 hours and made 3 more calls to reiterate my request. I even went down to the reception to ask if I could retrieve it by myself from them there and then but was refused and told I have to wait for the housekeeping regardless. We had to hold off our shower, were left in the room waiting and our post-wedding dinner reservation had to be cancelled due to this long delay. After 2 hours, we decided to leave for dinner without showering and had told the reception downstairs that we would collect the towel from them upon returning instead of having it sent to our room as there would be nobody to answer the bell. Shortly after, I got a call from the hotel saying the towels had just been delivered to our room. It meant that the housekeeping had entered our room again without consent! Again, we're lucky that no items were missing.I believe such standards of service are below par on what is expected from a renowned hotel brand.Not to mention the condition of the hotel that looked old with peeled wallpapers all over the place and torn lamps which gave a bad first impression. The room carpets also have stains on them.
title: Royale Chulan Damansara

A heartfelt thank you to Royale Chulan Penang for being such gracious hosts of our HR Conference. Special thanks to Dennis and his dedicated team—especially Wei Wei, who has been incredibly helpful in ensuring everything ran smoothly right from the start.

Throughout the event days, the F&B team, banquet crew, front office (special shoutout to Devika!), and housekeeping were simply outstanding. Your attention to detail, responsiveness, and warm hospitality truly made this a Conference to remember for all HR Practitioners from the Boustead Group.

We couldn’t have pulled off such a successful event without all of you—thank you!

The hotel is a bit dated but the room we had was spacious and bright with a nice view of Seremban.
Breakfast buffet is good although the coffee machines seem to need more than a little attention from staff each morning.
I used the gym a few times and it is adequate although it could be improved, I'd suggest adding a water fountain and a bottle of antibacterial hand lotion and also having the studio attached to the gym open for use as an area for stretching or other light exercise.
title: Royale Chulan Seremban

name: Mohd hasnol Abu hassan
text: A clean, comfortable place and close to the lake park
title: Royale Chulan Seremban

name: Sonia Nair
text:
Stayed here for one night.
They had even made a curtesy call to check on the room whether everything is fine. I’ve stayed in big names hotels but none made an effort to check about the room moment we checked in.
That’s one thing I like about Royale chulan Seremban. Definitely will book this hotel again.
title: Royale Chulan Seremban

name: Trip.com Member
text: A nice hotel for short getaway. Fast and easy check in process. Free car park is provided. Room is spacious and clean. Overall good experience.

Kita nk support selalu je dtg sini.

The room card is not working every time I come back to the hotel. And I need to go to the reception counter to settle it. That is really troublesome for me.

name: Trip.com Member
text: 地點方便，近商場
title: Royale Chulan Damansara

name: Anderson Tan
text: I recently stayed at Royale Chulan Damansara. The rooms are spacious and the location is fantastic, with easy access to nearby malls and restaurants. However, I found the service to be below par, and the hotel shows its age. Overall, a mixed experience—great location, but room for improvement in service quality.
title: Royale Chulan Damansara

name: Parth Garg
text:
I stayed at Royale Chulan for almost 7 days. Hotel service is soo great that I never felt the need to call them for anything. everyday I leave my iPad, and cash on table and it never got stolen.

Breakfast was good too. But not much veg only option for dinner
title: Royale Chulan Damansara

name: RADIAH BT. ABDUL GHANI
text: I was here to attend 2 days programme by university. The room is in excellent condition with fully functions toilet, tv, aircond etc, kind of luxury too. The coffee house  provides an excellent service with lots of food choices. Highly recommended for those who want to stay near to mall (the curve), ice skating arena etc.
title: Royale Chulan Damansara

name: Hartini Nadzalan
text:
Nice hotel. Cantik dan klasik ala-ala english. Suka dia punya design. Affordable price. Breakfast sedap.
Makanan sedap-sedap belaka. Malam-malam boleh turun makan kat kedai bawah sebelah Japanese restaurant tu. Ada masakan panas. Order nasi goreng kampung dan char kuew tiaw. Sedap gilerr..
title: Royale Chulan Damansara

name: beeyean
text: Attend the buffet dinner in the event hall. The food is not nice and the hall is hot.
title: Royale Chulan Damansara

name: ctnoor88
text:
The hotel offers several commendable features. The room is spacious and well-equipped with essential amenities such as fridge, hairdryer and coffee maker, ensuring a comfortable stay. Its strategic location is highly convenient, and the check-in & check-out are seamless. Additionally, my room featured a delightful pool view, which was both relaxing and enjoyable.

However, some aspects were disappointing for a 5-star hotel. The TV channels were limited, and the picture quality was often blurry. The room was not soundproof, so I could hear noises from the next room. Additionally, the elevators were very slow, even during non-peak hours. And there’s no internet or phone signal in the basement parking, making it hard to stay connected.

Overall, the hotel has potential but needs improvement in certain areas to truly match a 5-star standard.
title: Royale Chulan Damansara

name: SYAHRIAH. S
text: Food sangat sedap dan banyak pilihan
title: Royale Chulan Damansara

name: Trip.com Member
text: 住了两周，隔音不是很好，房间比较老，但是很干净，最后几晚隔壁带着小孩非常吵，一直吵到夜里两三点。 前面十几天都是很不错的。
title: Royale Chulan Damansara

name: Trip.com Member
text: 지난번에 이어서 여기서 다시 숙박 했습니다. 가성비 여전히 훌륭한 호텔입니다.  잎으로 계속 여기서. 숙박 할 거 같아요.
title: Royale Chulan Damansara

name: Trip.com Member
text: 酒店整体不算新建筑，保养得还不错。房间大小合适，符合10年前的五星级审美，比较干净卫生。大堂，泳池等公共区域非常耐看。早餐还行。
title: Royale Chulan Damansara

name: Trip.com Member
text: 吉隆坡五星酒店里，性价比不错的一家。早餐充分考虑了各族人群的口味。房间风格偏古典，10多年的历史，保养的还不错。
title: Royale Chulan Damansara

name: Trip.com Member
text: Very bad experience to stay over there , no one inform us the club lounge not open , when I check in only let me know have breakfast in coffee shop and afternoon tea set in room ,  I asked them also have two piece Landry per day and I gave them the Landry to wash and I keep chasing them until my checked out time the Landry is back to me since I no time to check because I need to go to airport when I back home unpack my luggage I find my shirt have other colour on it , so I not expected my clothes to wash and return me like this really not a 5 star hotel standard
title: Royale Chulan Damansara

name: Phaveena Alcaide (Pavi)
text:
The hotel has a charming old-style vibe, and the rooms are spacious, but unfortunately, they seem worn down and poorly maintained. There was an odd smell in the room, sometimes resembling smoke, which made my stay uncomfortable.

As someone with allergic rhinitis, the air quality in the room aggravated my condition and even progressed to a cough. The moldy smell, likely coming from the carpet, air conditioning, or curtains, was hard to ignore.

On the positive side, I appreciated the strong water pressure in the bathroom. However, I was disappointed that there was no bidet, which would have been a convenient addition.

Let me know if you’d like more changes!
title: Royale Chulan Damansara

name: Trip.com Member
text: Overall was good.might come again next time.walking distance to beach.
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: Ali Imran
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: Raidah Kamar
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: Scenic42946175905
text: The chalets is comfy with easy access to private beach. The room service is really great with nice hospitality provided by the management. A good place to stay for family vacation as its far from busy crowd of city or simply serve as escape from busy working days.
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: nurshafinim
text: The food were so great! So many choices during breakfast, lunch and dinner.|I like their chalet room. It was clean, the bed was comfy, bathroom was huge  and the staff were so friendly. Over all, their service was so good and we have a very nice stay!
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

text: Worth the looooooong travel!!!!!!!Had an amazing stay with friendly and helpful staff.... The room is a bit tired looking but still comfortable...Near the serene sea. Food can be improved. And there's an issue with some flies but all is well. Would consider coming back here.

text: My first experience of 3d2n business trip. Overall is good.but i think sofa and blanket in the room need  to be changed.The blanket is an old style blanket.the view is good with private beach.Dont have pool so need to go to the nearby villa with small payment.
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: Bee Hadi
text: Stayed here for 3 days 2 nights, service is amazing, the room is nicely furnished and everything is provided. The rooms are not soundproof so you can hear people talking next door, but it doesn't really bother my sleep!
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: Rahman Salim
text:
The chalets is good, clean surroundings but the public beach nearby outside of the chalets is dirty with no efforts to clean up those strewn foods containers.
Having said about the strewn rubbish, the chalets itself is worth staying, value for money, great courteous staffs, good breakfasts.
However if you want premium accomodations, try their villas up on the hill...amazing
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

text: Tranquil environment comfortable room
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: Trip.com Member
text: Best hotel ever in Cherating with ambience view and beautiful beach was awesome. Definitely will come again in future
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: Rosli AR
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: Tony Ng
text:
We had a wonderful time at the hotel. The price is reasonable, and it's just a short walk to the beach. Everyone had so much fun at the beach that no one wanted to leave. The service was good and friendly, and the room service is reasonably priced as well. The breakfast was just okay. The only downside is that access to the swimming pool is restricted during school holidays, even though we were willing to pay for it. There are also a few cafes and restaurants nearby.

我们在酒店度过了美好的时光。价格合理，离海滩只需步行几分钟。大家在海滩玩得非常开心，都不想离开。服务很好，工作人员非常友善，客房服务的价格也很合理。早餐一般。唯一的不足是，在学校假期期间泳池无法使用，即使我们愿意付费也不行。附近还有几家咖啡馆和餐厅。
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: Tan Ngang You
text: Very kampung feel villa. The staffs are friendly. I'm staying the corner high floor villa, sitting outside the unit feel the breeze.. very comfortable with companion..
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: Nik nicky
text:
Hi,

Our small family Day last week at Royal Chulan Cherating very² superb! We book 9 Standard Chalet with breakfast from 16 to 17 Sept 2024 with Mr. Faiza Musa, Guest Service Manager there. We also have a delicious Hari Malaysia BBQ for 27pax (including children/senior citizen) at Villa. The price is very reasonable and got 10% discount.

The arrangement is good, room is clean and good service from staff there. There is a beach behind and easy access for us to go there. No pool but no problem for us 🤣

Safe parking for your car, don’t worry! Very recommended for beach lovers.

Thanks.
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: haebaraki
text: Went there for our anniversary around early September. It was amazing stay! Greeted by staff from the guard house, always smiling and helpful! Check in process was smooth with free welcome drinks! You can park your car at designated area and you'll be picked up by van/buggy to go to reception area and your room! Staff was very helpful and always smiling! It was bonus points! You can move around villa in and out breezely since buggy was provided 24/7. Upon arrival to our room, i was mesmerized by the view! I requested for complimentary cake for my anniversary and they fulfilled them! Even provided me some simple swan towel decorations on bed, I really appreciate the gesture! Their services are top notch i can assure you! The room smells lovely! They even turned on aircond prior to your arrival to ensure the rooms are breezy! I loveee them! Got private beach all by yourself! If you're looking for lovely and serene place to relax, kindly consider this villa, worth every penny! Loving my stay here and i'll be back for suree! 🤍
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: asslailie baharudin
text: we check in 9 rooms 16/9/24 at resort royale chulan kuantan.thankyou for Mr Faiza Musa for the best arrangement room and suggestion for bbq dinner at villa. BBQ dinner very fun and food delicious 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻. the room cleans and very friendly and helpful staff. We enjoyed our stay and will go back there again. i want to suggest for add lamp at area beach, this is can the guest make activities at night area beach and very fun . make the beach look useful and beautiful too.. thankyou.

title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 酒店环境不错
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: forkid ishika
text:
Tempat cantik menarik tertarik.
Bilik bersih & selesa.
Buffett tidak banyak pilihan.
Rate 8/10

name: Raymond Lim
text: Brilliant in all service!!
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Nice, smell good, breakfast good , friendly staff
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Yogesh Thaker
text:
Trust me, when I say that in all the reviews that I do, be it Hotels, Restaurants, Eateries, Road Side Stalls, simply put, any establishments , I have been very honest and at times brutally out coming and earnestly straight forward

There are times when you feel you need a break and the first few things you do is check how you want to reach your destination and where you will be staying throughout the duration of your stay

This time was the desire to visit PENANG after a long absence
Checking through the Hotel Booking App, we decided upon ROYAL CHULAN PENANG

We have stayed in this hotel before which was right after the COVID.
I can still remember the amount of fun we had at this hotel albeit a few shortcomings on the Hotel side

Our expectations were not high, at all this time around as when we booked a room for our 7 nights stay the offer was very good and included Breakfast for 2

After checking in we went to our room. The moment I opened the door, we were greeted by an unpleasant odour
The room had hairs all over the carpet. The dust and grime on the carpet was very evident
Like I said no expectations at all. So silence on our part
As we were leaving for our lunch I stumbled upon one of the House Keeping crew and mentioned to him regarding the smell, dust and hairs
When we came back, the smell in the room was quite pleasant. The rest no need to mention
Our unpleasant encounter started the next day
Despite informing the Reception that we wanted our room to be done as were returning later in the day to rest, the room was not made
Being a Hotelier myself who now train new Hoteliers in Soft Skills, I understand the weekend rush to do the check out guests rooms first
However any requests by stay in guests should also be addressed
We came down to ask the same young Receptionist, SYAZLI regarding the room and he told us it was already in the system. I requested for an update once the room was made at which point we were joined by JOEL VESTOR who promptly replied that they were under no obligation to inform us if the room was made as they have no direct contact with House Keeping. What nonsense!

You are a 4 star hotel. I have witnessed better guests service from a 2 to 3 star Hotels

JOEL VESTOR just shrugged off any further communication and eye contact with me and slothly went to his Duty Desk . Noticing what just transpired, SYAZLI quickly apologised on behalf of JOEL VESTOR. A quirky and at the same time an embarrassing situation

As a Hotelier JOEL VESTOR demonstrated an attitude that is belittling, arragont and unbecoming of a DUTY MANAGER.
I noticed throughout our stay he would be at his desk with his computer and barely any eye contact with guests

MR JOEL VESTOR, come to one of my Classes, I will impart valuable training. FREE OF CHARGE.

From that day onwards, I would tell the House Keeping Crew myself. I got to know them throughout our stay
They were fast, efficient and very courteous
A BIG thank you to
ABANG ZUL , RAJU, SHABIR, KHALID
Best House Keeping Crew

Breakfast was a good with plenty of varieties
The Breakfast Crew were very friendly and helpful

It was indeed a pleasure to meet up with Mr ROHIM. A great personality and a superb Hotelier
Thank you to SEHA too, very friendly and a joy to chat with. Not forgetting a FILIPINA Crew "SALAMAT PO*

Honestly, it wasn't such a bad stay as we were in PENANG for work related matter from our HOTEL CHAIN HQ

Hotel needs major refurbishment and soft skills were lacking in some of the employees
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Lim Lye Huat
text:
Had Easter buffet lunch at your coffeehouse Sri Tanjung, food is above average and d crew members are hardworking, ever ready to clear plates/cutleries and d man in coat/Rohim is extremely hardworking, observance & polite .... will definately come back again...
It's d parking at RM10.00 shud be reviewed ....

TQ, Ronnie Lim (20/04/25)
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: ralph blewitt
text:
Excellent hotel fantastic service great buffet dinner.
Highly recommend a stay here if your in Penang
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Vincent Tung
text: The parking was really confusing, just when I found myself a very nice parking spot, I was asked to move my car because it was reserved for the employees even though it wasn’t written anywhere near the parking area that they were allocated for the employees! Still I find the interior is interesting as it has the complications of a maze and that’s what makes me like it, I love asymmetrical design!
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 这家酒店的预定可以免费取消。离轮渡码头不远，我们是走过去的，大概10-15分钟其实可以做免费公交CAT2站到金融街更方便。酒店入住方便，老式的星级宾馆的装修，服务也蛮好，有门童开门，早饭也蛮好吃的。性价比比较高，推荐！
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Good hotel and nice swimming pool
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: It was a comfortable stay at the hotel. Th staff were friendly in greeting when arrived. The lobby was clean and smelt good. In fact the entire hotel smelt wonderful. Rooms were big but the cleanliness can be improve. Breakfast was good too.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: simon meli
text: Selva at the pool keeps everything beautiful very helpful he has only been working here for 5 months but is so polite and helpful. Hotel must be proud. Afternoon tea was great all staff very polite and helpful
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: lee shyyi
text:
Rohim from the F&B team stands out every single time we stay here. His service, warmth, and attention to detail are unmatched—even compared to the front desk, who are supposed to be the first point of contact. He consistently delivers a level of hospitality that the rest of the team could learn from. Honestly, he should be leading guest relations. RC needs more like him.

Service crew in the F&B are amazing. Ling at the reception was welcoming.

Aircon in the room is top notch.

However, rooms are starting to feel a bit tired— kettle even had stains. When we asked for extra mineral water, we were told only 2 are provided, though they did eventually give us more. Not sure why they’re so stingy with the basics.

Asked for a hand towel and were told only rooms above the second floor get them by default; unless requested. its just handtowels - which are basic. Same with an extra room key—initial pushback, then gave us one with a reminder to return it.

At checkout, we were loading luggage into the car right at the lobby - a little help would've been nice. It’s all these little things. We’ve stayed here countless times, but the service just isn’t what it used to be.

Overall, still a good hotel, with good value.

Make RC great again.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Knight Light (夜光)
text:
The room conditions is old school hotel style but still in good conditions and good hygiene.

The hotel breakfast has less variety of food but still value for the money.

The basement parking is available, however, the reception kinda mess up the parking part. They did not send in my car plate number for the hotel guest complementary parking. When I tried to exit the parking, turns out I need to pay for the parking. Luckily, there are hotel staff near the parking exit which I can request the help from them for me to exit without the need of paying the parking.

They WILL NOT send you invoice like the reception told me until you email to them. The good thing is that they response to my email within 1 working day although they sent me the wrong invoice info.

I will still choose this hotel for staying in Seremban although there is some unpleasant experience.
title: Royale Chulan Seremban

name: Shalz Rjndran
text: Stayed here for a night. Excellent hospitality. Check in and check out was smooth. Room was large,clean, and comfortable. Would come back
title: Royale Chulan Seremban

name: Trip.com Member
text: Very old hotel with old furnishing. Nothing to really shout out loud but i think this is probably one of the better hotel in seremban due to not many hotel choices here.
title: Royale Chulan Seremban

name: Trip.com Member
text: My favourite hotel to stay in Seremban. Cozy place to be with my family. Near to the city
title: Royale Chulan Seremban

name: Muhammad Haikal Mukhtar
text:
Book 1 room. 2 single beds with breakfast. The hotel provides us with 2 parking lots.

The room service is clean and spacious.
Have mini fridge, hair dryer as well as iron and its board.

The pool is very clean.
They provide separate towels just for the pool goers.

The breakfast is plentiful. Enough for everybody.

Good services from every staff working there. They always smile.
title: Royale Chulan Seremban

name: Amir Halim
text:
Booked for connecting room, i must say its spacious.
Children love the pool and slide- not to forget the jacuzzi.
Breakfast is awesome! Plenty to choose- 3days 2 night just not enough
title: Royale Chulan Seremban

name: Shafiqul Islam
text: My mother nature is beautiful.
title: Royale Chulan Seremban

name: Trip.com Member
text: Booked 3 rooms. My room, shower no hot, got baby lipas 2 ekor. Remote tv not working. We are too lazy to call for maintenance. So we sleep with tv on since the main switch the back of the cabinet. Luckily the volume is slow😂. Kids enjoy the pool very much.
title: Royale Chulan Seremban

name: travel local.
text:
very friendly service staff..
room are clean and comfortable..
this hotel connect with shopping complex..
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Woon Yang Ng
text: the hotel is kind of old, but the aircon is very powerful and the water strong and hot. clean and well kept in general. service is good too. well connected to The Curve and IPC Mall. 20min from Subang airport by car.
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Ain Dannia
text: terbaik.. hotel selesa, bersih, paling best nak ke mall jalan kaki je.
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Katherine Wong
text:
I have stayed at 3 Royale Chulans in KL and I ranked this the best in how well it is run.  Communication is via WhatsApp which was answered promptly , checking in process fast and efficient. Breakfast is adequate and never varies but I enjoy the roti chanai and the chicken curry . Room is a little dated and the mixer in the bathroom does not really work - but hot water is plentiful and water pressure strong .
But the things that make this hotel my top choice is not really about the hotel - the 5mins walk to MRT, the Curve with enough spas and eateries for a short stay and the partnership with Fitness First gym which is just a short 3 mins walk away .
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: shan mary
text: Very nice and convenient place for relax and shopping...very good service and friendly staff especially front office and concierge team.
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: elina
text: mr shan is very polite. good service too. i love yall
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Azlida Alias
text:
Pertama kali stay sini. Bilik penginapan yang sangat selesa, luas, bersih dan lengkap dengan amenities yang diperlukan. Lokasi hotel yang sangat dekat dengan kemudahan shopping mall, restaurants dan hanya berjalan kaki ke IKEA !!

Sangat recommended untuk stay disini. Harga yang berbaloi termasuk sarapan. Pasti anda tidak akan menyesal.
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Karunakaran Krishna Nair
text: Ok, quite a busy place, surrounded by shopping malls. Parking is not a problem and it's paid parking with cashless (using a card)exit.
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Peer Mouwen
text: The pool is a great location to relax, beside their is a Gym. We met Selva the poolboy who takes care of the gym and the pool. The Guy is cheer and helpful. But more important he takes care of this location if it were its own childeren. Everything is Nice, Tidy and very clean.

title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Disappointing Front Desk ServiceOn March 27, 2025, at around 1 PM, I encountered an unpleasant experience during checkout at Royale Chulan Hotel. I had accidentally left my room key card in the breakfast restaurant and asked a male front desk supervisor (in a black uniform with a black tie) to call and check if it was there. Instead of assisting, he simply told me that it was my responsibility to bring the key card to the front desk to avoid an RM20 charge. His response was dismissive and lacked professionalism. A well-trained supervisor should handle guest concerns with proper manners and a helpful attitude. This experience left a negative impression of the hotel's service quality.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: I will definitely book this hotel again if I visit Petaling Jaya, Malaysia again. Spacious double bed room and bathroom was clean. The breakfast was good. The staff would help us safe keep our luggage bags after we had checked out from the hotel.
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: ali boz
text: The only good thing I can say about the hotel is that its location is very nice. Other than that, everything else is below average. I can also say that the employees are well-intentioned and helpful, but it was a bad experience for us. The rooms are bad, the wallpaper is peeling off. There is no phone in the rooms. We had to call the hotel's external line to tell them that the TV was not working. When no one came for hours, we went to the reception and complained, and we learned that they used the Whats Up line instead of the phone line. The breakfast was also below average. The breakfast is aimed at local customers. As a result, I was not satisfied.
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Imran Haziq Bin Khairul Anuar
text:
I stayed at this hotel for two nights and overall, I would describe the experience as quite average. The highlights of my stay were definitely the food and the service from the staff. The breakfast buffet offered a good variety of traditional Malay dishes, all of which were flavourful and well-prepared. The staff were generally friendly and accommodating, and service requests were handled promptly. Check-in was also quick and efficient which I appreciated after a long day of travel.

However, there were several disappointing aspects that overshadowed the positives. First and foremost, the hotel seems to charge guests for almost everything. There is no complimentary parking even in-house guests are required to pay for it. Additionally, any extra amenities such as towels or blankets come with a charge of around RM5–RM10, which is quite unusual compared to other hotels I’ve stayed at. It felt unnecessarily inconvenient and rather stingy for a hotel of this supposed calibre.

Another major issue is the condition of the hotel itself. While it may have once been considered ‘classic’, it now feels outdated and neglected. The entire property is in desperate need of refurbishment. The wallpaper in my room was peeling, the carpet and flooring were stained and the bed frame had visible damage. It’s clear that maintenance has been long overlooked.

This seems to be a recurring theme across the Royale Chulan hotel chain. There appears to be a reluctance to invest in proper renovation and upkeep, and it shows. Some properties, like Royale Chulan The Curve, have deteriorated to the point where regular maintenance no longer suffices. Major renovations are urgently needed. Cleanliness was also questionable during my stay, with visible dust throughout the room, making the space feel uncomfortable and unhygienic.

In conclusion, while the staff and food provided a pleasant touch to the experience, the overall condition and policy of the hotel leave much to be desired. I hope the management seriously considers investing in renovations and better upkeep before these properties fall further into decline.
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Marzira Yusof
text:
Pros:
Great views from suite. Updated furnishings with complimentary capsuled coffee.
Comfortable room size (stayed at ocean view suite).

Cons:
Check in:
Staff at reception during check in was unfriendly and lack of empathy.
Request for small extra things like bath mat was turn down reason given was the type of room chosen only allowed with one bath mat.
Room svs:
Paid for extra head count but we are not allowed for extra mattress to the least as reason given its not allowed for our room type.
Spa:
Without consent our agreed appointment time was shifted to time of their convenience. Correspondence was not prompt. Need to wait for few hours before receiving any reply.
Cafe:
Breakfast need to book for time slots if 1.30 hr each slot. Even 2 star boutique hotel does not require the guests to book their bfast timeslot.
Different locations of dining to suit their other corporate guests. We were told to have our dinner(a prebook half board meal) in room reason was because the cafe was booked for pte event. Ultimatum given, to have the dinner outside the cafe or at the pool bay without thinking of our mobility issues(2 guests have difficulty in walking) and the warm night as outside only fans is available.
Bfast on first day was at the reception area.            ( reason there was a corporate meeting held at the cafe)
But the remaining 2 days we can have our bfast at the cafe.
To sum up.. we were placed all over the place for our dining with the lack of empathy or guilt.

Special mentioned to Nizam for remedying the situation. He allowed us to have our dining at the right location which it should be.
Let us have the extra mattress for the extra guest(paid extra guest).
Help to resolve and get our spa slot back.
Arrange for super nice last day dinner menu to make up for unpleasant series of events.
Heads up to the cafe team for your wonderful service and the Chef that prepared our sumptuous special dinner …accept for the guy who called and ask us to have out dinner in our room and the guy who refused to arrange our dinning table so that we can eat together and not eat on separate table.
Kudos Nizam and cafe team!!!
You are the faces of the Royal Chulan Villas.. keep up the fabulous attitude 👍👍

It is surrounded by many hotels, mostly tall high risers! This hotel has an olde charm and faded beauty, but I enjoyed soaking up the nostalgia of it. The staff are so lovely, courteous and polite. I would stay again. Maintenance and upgrading of the rooms needs attention to restore it to its formal glory. The swimming pool is maintained well.
Breakfast has a variety of selections to suit many palates and diets.

name: Trip.com Member
text: Waited for a missing hairdryer from the room with my wet hair while waiting for them to “check” whether the hairdryer is really “missing” from my room is the first time ever in my many years of traveling. I requested for a late check out and was collected a deposit upon check in and later when I checked again, was informed that it is only upon availability and can only check the next day because they are running full house. I immediately voiced my dissatisfaction because I was not informed about it when I checked in and requested it. Then they took a while to check and told me I can have a late check out. It is not because I enjoyed the stay, only because I was working and need to go back to hotel after lunch to take a shower and change. And when I requested for an additional towel, again I was informed that the hotel is running full house and couldn’t give additional towel, they can only “exchange” a towel. Again, I was speechless. As a business traveler, I’ve travelled to many countries and stay in many hotels, never once I’ve faced this type of treatment and my request wasn’t unreasonable. I chose this hotel because it was the nearest to the place I worked and that’s all
title: Royale Chulan Seremban

name: Nur.zailin
text: I had a wonderful stay at this hotel! The hospitality was top-notch; the staff went above and beyond to make us feel welcome and attended to our every need. The room was spacious and clean , with a stunning view of the beach that made each morning a delight. Our room was uphill , most of the time we need to request a buggy to move around the resort. The buggy service was very efficient & fast. The resort staff Mr. Hadi was very helpful to assist us with our activities nearby the resort.   The entire experience was relaxing and enjoyable. Highly recommended!
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: Umi Sarina
text: Still waiting for the manager to contact me regarding the pest issue in the room.
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: Beenish Rizwan
text:
We stayed in the villa for a weekend getaway, a family of 4 with 2 teenagers kids . The staff is very helpful . We had a good time at the beach , food at the restaurant is good plus the room service is exceptionally good , buggy were easy to call . The location is beautiful . We enjoyed our stay and love to go back there again  in sha Allah . Only thing we think there should be lamp /lights on the beach for night . This is will make the beach look beautiful and useful in the late eve as well .
Thanks for the wonderful hospitality and service .
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: Soo Long Kong
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: Mirror 7800
text: Royal Chulan Cherating Chalet - Very friendly staffs especially Puan Suraya and comfy accommodations. Highly recommended
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: Trip.com Member
text: The view is awesome, but the breakfast needs to be improved in quality, nothing special. The room is clean but requires a lot of renovation. If we need to pay full price definitely not worth it
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: fezrai rezza
text: The best experience with royal chulan i had. Staff are very friendly and the environment very clean. Only breakfast need to improve. I check in 2night. The room was clean and nice. Good experience
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: C K
text: Staff are great, buggy and shuttle service around the resort is helpful. The beach is clean, private and magnificent. The restaurant is pretty and looks out to the sea, prices in the restaurant are reasonable. Love their delicious signature Royale drinks.
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: Soo Long kong
text: OK拉
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: H.L F
text:
We book a tub villa which just located next to the lobby. Room was super big for 2 adults and 1 child.
The environment is quiet and relax. Not much activities that you can do there, only swimming or just hang out around the beach.
No alcohol serve in the hotel as they didn’t mentioned in website.

Going to the beach or restaurant you will need to travel with buggy. The drivers and staffs are friendly but the waiting time for buggy might be long.

Overall comfortable trip.
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: Hazim Huzaifah
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: Humairah Remle
text: I had an excellent experience here last weekend. The staff was incredibly friendly and accommodating. My room was spacious and clean with a beautiful view of the beach. I particularly enjoyed the bbq & breakfast buffet, which had a wide variety of delicious options. I would highly recommend this villas to anyone visiting Cherating!
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: sjpmiller
text: Had a pleasant stay at Royal Chulan Villas. Room was clean, spacious and had a great view of the sea. Staff were polite and helpful and a 24-hour buggy service runs to take you between different parts of the resort (there are a lot of steep hills!) For the drinkers out there, there was no alcohol available at all, which isn’t mentioned on their website. There are a number of beach cafes a few minutes away where you can grab a drink, but these didn’t seem to open until around 6pm.
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: Steve Miller
text: Had a pleasant stay at Royal Chulan Villas. Room was clean, spacious and had a great view of the sea. Staff were polite and helpful and a 24-hour buggy service runs to take you between different parts of the resort (there are a lot of steep hills!) For the drinkers out there, there was no alcohol available at all, which isn’t mentioned on their website. There are a number of beach cafes a few minutes away where you can grab a drink, but these didn’t seem to open until around 6pm.
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: A. Alias
text: Luxury. Peace. Spectacular view. Comfortable room. These elements gives you a memorable weekend getaway with your love ones..
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: MarcC597
text: Really great wholesome resort with super friendly staff. Arrived and met by a buggy that takes you up to reception and on to the rooms. ||Pool incredible and not sure if we were out of season but both beach and pool were empty during the day. Great location. For the sun as well if you wanted to top up a tan. Family were happy with the pool but as mentioned beware of the jellyfish. Went in the sea to paddle but several large (not poisonous ones) washed up on the beach. Suggest wet suit if surfing. ||A few bars/cafes on the beach but do alternate open days so check before going out. A little limited for choice outside but restaurant was great in hotel ( oceans) with good selection. ||Cherating resort unfortunately seems to have become a bit deserted. Not sure if this was covid related as with most resorts but a lot of hotels are closed and derelict along the whole East coast area we were in. ||Hotel is DRY by the way. You have to bring your own beer if you want one during your stay. ||Really enjoyed being here. Definitely for the more adventurous European family. But a stunning spot. ||Thank you to the wonderful staff.
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: Maiza Sweet
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: Alex G
text: The chalet room is comfortable. The beach is very very peaceful and beautiful. Good for some small surfing too
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: Mysara Ismail
text: Stayed for a night in Chalet 4111. The chalet is perfect for two, featuring a TV area, bedroom, washroom, and a balcony with chairs overlooking the gardens and offering easy beach access. It's ideal for beach lovers and those who appreciate the area's natural beauty. The breakfast spread is decent, with a variety of options including local dishes like nasi hujan panas paired with ayam kurma, fried mee, and porridge, as well as English breakfast items like baked beans, sausages, mashed potatoes, a salad section, buns, cereals, an egg station, and desserts like fruits and cakes. Overall, Royale Chulan Chalet Cherating is an excellent choice for a relaxing and enjoyable stay, blending comfort, a sense of luxury, and natural beauty. Highly recommended!
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: Trip.com Member
text: I really enjoy the views. The room is also nice. Big space, fresh air and peaceful.
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: Fung Eddie
text: Service is good. Breakfast is awesome. Clean room. Location is good. Highly recommend.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Irfan Khan
text: Wonderful stay
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Arun Surendran
text:
Royale Chulan Penang perfectly blends colonial charm with modern comfort. The location is fantastic—right in the heart of George Town, making it easy to explore heritage sites and local food spots. Rooms are spacious, clean, and well-equipped, ensuring a relaxing stay. The staff are warm and attentive, providing excellent service. The facilities, including the pool and gym, are well-maintained, and the breakfast buffet offers a great variety of delicious options.

Highly recommend this hotel for a luxurious and convenient stay in Penang!
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 酒店服務貼心，供應免費車接送遊市中心。提供早餐自助餐，方便。

text: I had a wonderful stay at Royale Chulan Penang. The room was spacious and elegant, truly living up to its name.The Sahur meal had a great variety of delicious options, making it a satisfying experience.The staff were friendly and attentive, ensuring a smooth and comfortable stay.Overall, a fantastic hotel with great service, good food, and a royal touch. Highly recommended!
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: This is a great place to stay, as it is conveniently located near restaurants and public facilities.

pros

Walking distance to the curve and ikea. Conclusion worth every penny.

name: Trip.com Member
text: 非常好的体验 吃了早餐实在是太多印度菜了 口味实在享受不了

name: Mozali Mohd
text:
The hotel is nice and beautiful but needs a little bit of upgrading for some facilities such as room interior and equipment. However, it did not dampen our mood while staying at the hotel. The Netflix channel also helps us a lot in filling our free time if we don't go out for sightseeing.
Many thanks to the hotel staff who were friendly, helpful and guided us throughout our stay.
Shout-outs also to the management who arranged a birthday surprise by sending a slice of cake to our room.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 房间一般，设施叫陈旧，卫生间的毛巾架松动，一拉就下来了，还好我有塞了回去，本来想浴缸泡个澡，可惜热水龙头坏的，团团转，房间电话机是坏的，来了两次，还是没修好，我也不能电话联系前台，只能下去，前台服务人员我住了3天，没遇上有可以中文沟通的，早餐样式偏印度方向，适合中国人的很少，对付一下吧，离柏威年，百盛，双子塔等可以徒步，差不多也就20多分钟，客房服务员还行
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 飞国内是凌晨1点半多航班，在原酒店附近开了一晚房，服务和地理位置还不错，设施太老旧了，卫生也十分一般，就满足一个6小时休息，走前洗澡就行了！
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: Quite good in overall. Convenient, satisfactory service.  Lots of choices in breakfast buffet
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 十几年前入住过这家酒店，这次又故地重游，感觉设施都老化了，但地理位置还是不错的，性价比还可以。但是酒店非要收取城市税，我们出示了携程的收费明细，掰扯了好几次才要回来
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 作为老牌五星酒店，酒店大堂富丽宏伟，很适合休息。酒店特别大，容易迷路。房内设施稍显老旧，但工作人员服务态度很好。早餐很丰富。忘记拍照片了。
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

text: Good location, friendly place. Clean hotel . Very comfortable . Enjoy with family

text: Pengalaman berkesan sepulang dari Jelebu Madrasah Tahfiz Yamin, terima kasih
title: Royale Chulan Seremban

name: AF Mohammad
text:
+ Room is spacious & rather clean
+ Outdoor swimming pool is huge, complete with warm jacuzzi. Perfect!
+ Close to Lake Garden & State Mosque
+ Ample & easy parking system

- Location is at the city centre but a bit isolated from good restaurants, not within walking distance
- Interior & furniture designs are a little outdated
- TV size is too small for today's standard, signal quality for movie channels are just terrible
title: Royale Chulan Seremban

name: Trip.com Member
text: Good space. The facilities and bedsheets, etc are very old and not maintained to standard.
title: Royale Chulan Seremban

name: Zamz 77
text: Went here for wedding ceremony... The chef/hotel arrangement for guest eating is the worst one... Been a lot to another hotel for wedding... This is the definitely the worst one...
title: Royale Chulan Seremban

name: Mohd Rasyidi Ismail
text:
If rated as 4 Star, it is not worth for money. Worn off furniture, minimal menu for breakfast, vegetation not tendered and staf not that friendly except the uncle working at the swimming pool. The only positive thing --- foods for room dining was satisfactory.

As experienced before, booked thru Agoda, u will get the worst room at the end of the floor.
title: Royale Chulan Seremban

name: LittleCatz Shop
text:
Average 😟 for 4🌟 hotel

F&B
Sampai lewat petang.  So walkin ke restoran order alacarte.  Chicken chop keras & ada part yang tak masak. So so disappointed. Bila complain dekat counter,  dia kata"nanti saya inform chef" 😶. My opinion if guest hotel not satisfied they should replace it or gift complimentary for guest. Tak pe lah saya bukan VIP 😅
So dinner kami makan luar which is way more better 😋 yumm kenyang perut
Breakfast- not so much choice & tasteless.  After what happened yesterday evening i expecting breakfast should be better but hemmm...
Saya bukan jenis cerewet makan , saya suka makan2 tapi sayang bila makan macam tu.
Hopefully F&B improve 🙏 chef please take note 🙏

Room & bathroom - bilik ok bersih but ceiling cracked every where,  risau pula jatuh 😅,  bilik air ada berbau mcm bau lipas ke lembap ke x pasti lah .... Keluasan bilik ok ada space untuk solat. Sejadah disediakan👍 . Perabot lama tapi ok la dijaga. Tilam x berapa selesa agak keras 🥴 maybe sbb tilam lama kot.

Parking  - free. Area situ malam sunyi.

Ini review jujur saya 🙏 lain orang lain rasa kan.
For me ROYAL CHULAN KL more better
title: Royale Chulan Seremban

name: Zainal abidin Pengco
text: What a great pleasure of having our conference here in this hotel. Great room after refurbishment. Superb dishes and lovely nice lunch and diner
title: Royale Chulan Seremban

name: Ali Abu
text:
Suasana ceria.
Perkhidmatan baik & mesra.
Tempat letak kerata mencukupi.

name: Trip.com Member
text: Clean and modern hotel. Strategic location and easy access to tour place.
title: Royale Chulan Seremban

name: Tiras Raduan
text: Delicious and variety of food for the buffet lunch
title: Royale Chulan Seremban

name: Trip.com Member
text: Overall the stay was ok. Room is a bit old, maybe due to room carpet looks old. Bed is comfortable. I book the room for 1 adult and 2 kids with free breakfast but when entry time, they want me to pay RM 25 for another kid. I thought when i key in all details, it should be all included.Breakfast buffet is normal variety. My kids like the swimming pool and on weekend, there is a lot kids in the morning.
title: Royale Chulan Seremban

name: Med Amine
text: Nice place
title: Royale Chulan Seremban

name: Nicola Fabozzi
text: Locale accogliente e con davanti una bella piscina per passare una piacevole giornata
title: Royale Chulan Seremban

name: Trip.com Member
text: 舊酒店,內部看得出已經翻新,但房間很多設施好像沒有保養維修,洗澡時的水湧出外面,洗完澡外面一灘水,希望酒店能夠檢查房間沖涼房花灑頭水龍頭的運作,早餐食物品種還可以,遇到問題時員工可以即時提供協助,性在地點好,下次還會再住！
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: KENNETH KUMAR JAYAKUMAR
text: Excellent
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Michel Sinner
text:
Das Hotel hat offenbar früher bessere Zeiten gesehen.
Bei uns fanden sich schwarze Haare in der Dusche, die Bettwäsche hatte mysteriöse schwarze Flecken, im Randbereich des Teppichbodens befand sich Schmutz, im Flur löste sich die Tapete bahnenweise ab usw. Die Planken um den Pool sind schadhaft und bedeuten eine erhebliche Verletzungsgefahr. Vom Pool aus kann man auch die Alkoven des Dachgeschosses sehen. Dort ist die Dachkonstruktion derart marode, dass der Absturz einzelner Fragmente droht.
Ergo: Niemals 4☆ wert
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Bella Del Luna
text: Great location, Clean room, breakfast was good, parking limited. Nothing much to complaint everything was good just it would be better to improve their customer service experience.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Wee Hock ONG
text:
family size. clean room.
hope to have a good rest there few days here.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Boon Guan Ooi
text: Went for the Ramadan buffet dinner..
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: vendredi1
text: Nous avons séjourné 9 nuits début mars au Royale Chulan . Notre chambre était au cinquième.|Les moins: Nuisance sonores extèrieures importantes, climatisations , turbine à eau de l'mmeuble proche,bruits circulations automobiles de l'avenue menant au ferry fenêtres simples vitrages insufisantes. (boules quies utiles...)|Petit déjeuner médiocre.|Les plus: Chambre bien conçue,mobilier plaisant, internet de qualité, prise murale HDMI et USB reliées à la TV, literie confortable.|Piscine très agréable et salle de sport bien entretenue.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Wanderer614513
text: Nous avons séjourné 9 nuits au Royale Chulan Penang début mars.Notre chambre était au cinquième .|Les moins : Nuisances sonores extèrieures importantes, climatiseurs, turbines à eaux pour l'immeuble de bureaux proche et bruits de la circulation automobile sur l'avenue menant au ferry, le vitrage des fenêtres simples non adaptés à cet environnement.(boules quies utiles)|Petit déjeuner médiocre pour le prix .|Les plus: Chambre bien conçue, mobilier plaisant,internet correct, prise USB et HDMI murale reliées à la TV ,literie confortable.|Piscine agréable et salle de sport bien entretenue.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Bollejef
text:
Great hotel right next to the ferry and the center.
The staff is very friendly, breakfast was amazing (may have been different due to Ramadan tho).
Very big comfortable room, sadly the usb connection(build into the wall) to the smart tv didn’t work …
The pool was very nice and towels were provided.
The property in general had a few minor maintenance issues, the main one being the exhaust of the airco being full of dust like it wasn’t cleaned in the last year(s).
All in all we had a great stay.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: nur permatahati
text: Stayed 3 nights..today checkout. Very comfy bed & pillows, clean n spacious room, best room lightings ..many mirrors. Sahur many foods available including 1 egg stations standby for your order. Staffs very polite in welcoming guest... meet my expectations.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Location is great and room is spacious
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Mei Lin Siew
text:
Friendly and accomodating staff especially staff at reception desk, Ling, and all other staff who were very attentive, helpful and gave great service.
Room was large, spacious and very clean. Very efficient housekeeping team. Provided ample topping up of drinking water, coffee and tea, daily.
Excellent and strategic location in Georgetown, close to many eateries and UNESCO heritage sites.
The room came with breakfast for 2 - great value at an affordable price.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Glenn brooks
text: Good location, breakfast and service.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Siripan H.
text:
ห้องพักสะอาด​ เราพักห้อง​ Corner room 4 คืน​ แบบ​และฟังก์ชัน​ห้องพักสวยและเป็นสัดส่วน​สะดวกสบาย​มาก​

เตียงนอน​ใหญ่ดี​ แต่ความนุ่มสบายของเตียง​ ​และผ้าห่มไม่เหมือนที่คาดหวังไว้

อาหารเช้ารสชาติ​ดี​ แต่อาหารมีให้เลือกน้อย​ ไม่หลากหลาย​

พนักงานให้บริการดีมาก​ทุกคน​ ให้ความสำคัญและใส่ใจแขกที่มาพัก​ ประทับใจมาก

ที่ตั้งโรงแรมไม่พลุกพล่าน​ เหมาะแก่การพักผ่อน

The room was clean. I stayed in the Corner Room type for 4 nights. The room layout and functionality were beautiful, well organized, and very comfortable.

The bed was large, but the comfort of the mattress and the blanket did not meet our expectations.

The breakfast was tasty, but the food selection was limited and lacked variety.

The staff provided excellent service, every one of them. They paid attention to and cared for the guests, which was very impressive.

The hotel's location was not crowded and was perfect for relaxation.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Heri Hall
text: Hotel ini jauh dari hospital,sekitar 5 km. Cari makanan ada tapi tidak begitu banyak seperti di tengah kota. Tapi kalau mau cari ketenangan di sini tempat yang cocok. Lokasi dekat dengan dermaga kapal pesiar. Kamar cukup luas. Breakfast banyak pilihan. Ada tempat gym. Kolam renang bagus dengan air asin sehingga badan relaks. Pelayanan sangat ramah.

Стоило бы помыть окна в ресторане, на первом этаже это вполне возможно сделать, очень грязные.

Also it was Christmas time so we got a gingerbread man cookie but since I had 1 cookie and 2 kids the staff was nice enough to give both kids more cookies so they don’t fight! Kudos for their customer service!

name: Trip.com Member
text: Traditional colonial style building and very different from concrete tower block hotels. Little tired in places, but this didn’t detract from ambience of hotel. We had a 2 bed apartment was very spacious, all but a little dark from limited natural light. It had a good size fridge and washing machine Very smiley and friendly staff. Good location for central KL for the Pavilion shopping mall and food court. We walked to the twin towers. Buffet breakfast had many international dishes with a wide choice. Lovely pool, which was occasionally taken over by school children (which was the downside of Malaysian school holidays). Our apartment lacked some basic utensils like glass tumblers/wine glasses, tea towel, washing machine powder. Not all the light bulbs worked, as well as the TV. When we arrived there was a brown object on the lounge carpet which was either chocolate or something worse.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: This is our second time here at Royale Chulan KL. We love our stay the moment we step into the beautiful lobby with friendly faces of the staff. Our room was spacious and pleasant decorated. Our breakfast has sufficient choices. Walking distance to malls and shops. Our choice.

name: Hock Lye, Khaleel, CHAN
text:
If not for the friendly staff they would have a much lower rating. The service staff are friendly even though it apparent that they are understaffed. Front desk staff are luckier since there are more of them to be helpful. I like their WhatsApp reporting system, since they are responsive and get things done.

Otherwise, this is an old establishment. Facilities and amenities are dated and tired. There are stains, chipped and broken  parts. I even suspect that the aircon and carpet is  mouldy as I started to have a mild allergic reaction.

The coffee we had at the restaurant was not impressive so were the breakfast other took for the few days we’re there.
title: Royale Chulan Damansara

name: Sandra Austin
text:
Checked in 3 rooms.

First room so dirty. Still instant noodles near the coffee area. Carpet not cleaned and had bad smell. Bathroom had toothbrush but no towels. Had to ask from the cleaners.

Second room was not as dirty as the first but no towels, no toothbrush, and the lamp shade was falling apart. 2 towels came only after we showered and drip dried.

Third room, no toothbrush and no towels. Moderately clean.

After dinner I asked reception if they usually provide hand towels and toothbrush and they said they would send to the room.
It's understandable if something was overlooked and maybe 1 thing was amiss in 1 room.
But I've never paid so much for 3 rooms where you have to ask so many times for just the very basic! 1 star hotels usually at least give a towel when you check in.

The construction happening around the hotel provides a lengthy walk to the mall which is okay during the day but did not feel safe walking back at night.

The buffet breakfast offers a wide variety of local and western foods. Most items were cold and stale. Suggest ordering something fresh from the hot bar. But the french toast was nice. The melon and the coffee was good. I wouldn't recommend much else.

I enjoyed the bed. It was quite comfortable. But that's about all.
I don't think I would recommend or return.
title: Royale Chulan Damansara

name: Trip.com Member
text: 此次入住[酒店名称]，整体体验超棒，必须点赞！酒店位置绝佳，交通便利，周边餐饮购物丰富，方便至极。前台服务热情高效，入住退房流程顺畅，工作人员还贴心提供游玩攻略。房间干净整洁，床品舒适，设施齐全，细节之处尽显用心，如免费矿泉水、精致茶包等。卫生间干湿分离，洗浴用品品质上乘，热水充足。早餐丰盛可口，中西式皆有，新鲜水果、热菜、面包等满足味蕾。酒店还设有健身房、游泳池等休闲设施，让客人在闲暇之余尽情放松。强烈推荐这家酒店给各位出行的朋友，相信你也会在此留下美好回忆，享受一段愉快的住宿时光，期待下次再来！
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Ruslan
text:
Отличное расположение. Отель не новый, но хорошо поддерживается. Персонал хороший. Завтрак вполне нормальный, кофе только плохой, как это часто бывает на завтраках в отелях
Стоило бы помыть окна в ресторане, на первом этаже это вполне возможно сделать, очень грязные.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Magdalena Kämpfer
text: Wenn die Option „0 Sterne“ verfügbar wäre, dann würden wir die auf jeden Fall auswählen!! Die Fotos auf Booking stimmen überhaupt nicht mit der Realität überein. In jeder Ecke liegt Zentimeter hoch der Staub, an den Wänden sind braune Flecken, im Bad schimmelt es und auf dem Bett sind nicht identifizierbare Flecken. Alle Kästen und Kommoden sind dreckig mit Staub, Flecken und Haaren. Aufgrund dessen haben wir um ein neues Zimmer gebeten, das haben wir auch bekommen. Zu unserer großen Enttäuschung war das neue Zimmer im gleichen Zustand. Wir haben keine einzige Nacht hier verbracht, sondern sofort storniert. Das einzig Positive: Wir haben dem gesamten Betrag rückerstattet bekommen.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Timothy Surendonk
text: Of the four hotels we stayed on our Malaysia visit, this was by far the best. While the hotel itself may be a just a little bit tired, everything else really exceeded our expectations, from the room amenities (including a good aircon), the kindness of the staff, and the varied breakfast buffet. It was also great value for money. Highly recommended.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Stay for night. Check in a bit late around 1030pm. Request for late check out around 1pm but the hotel just ignores my request and the reason the hotel is fully booked
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Axel Kee
text:
Great service by staff, especially housekeeping (thank you Mithu!)

Good breakfast food selection

Excellent location, walking distance to a lot of attractions
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Peter Wild
text:
Wow!  It’s not often I’d say that about a hotel, but this was special.  I was looking for a more upmarket colonial style in a good location in Georgetown and this exceeded all expectations.

The attic suite room was fabulous and a great surprise. Entering the room is a small sitting room which leads onto an enormous balcony overlooking the port. Adjacent is the large main bedroom including a desk and dressing table plus a table for luggage. The main bathroom is large with a stand alone bath, and separate large cubicles for shower and toilet. The ceiling is partly open into the attic space above revealing old beams etc. All stylishly refurbished. Location is great close to the historic areas of George town, Little India and the ferry port with some great restaurants nearby.

Disappointing not to find a cocktail bar in such a prestigious establishment.  A gin and Tonic, for those who didn’t partake in the “English Afternoon Tea”  would have been welcome!  Sadly, the “tea” was for two people and not suitable for a lone traveler.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Boney Nathan
text: Great place to stay in Penang. Close to amazing food and shopping. One of the best hotels we've stayed. We loved it so much, 2 weeks became a month long stay. Thank you for a memorable Penang holiday.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Great breakfast; very clean room and excellent customer service. Only downside is not a lot of parking; the outside facade misleading: once you get in, it’s 5 star hotel, almost. Will be back for sure. Loved the heritage feeling.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

text: A really nice hotel with great service. We enjoyed our stay so much. The breakfast was diverse enough to suit everyone. It was very luxurious.

Thank you so much Ling and Dhevika . Both of you are the best. Dari awal kita dtg for room arrangements for wedding , dari check in even after check out. They try to accommodate everything and every of our family. Their services are on top! Definitely will come back bcs of them !Thank you so much ❤️

First time check in sini everything are perfect ❤️

Sorry Dhevika, you balik awal sgt , no pic together 🥹.

text: Rooms is excellent...First time staying in this hotel and I am satisfied with the room. And I will return to this hotel if I go to Penang again.

name: Vno S
text:
Updated review.

I came in at 3pm to check in and the reception was handling the guests very slowly. I came back at 5.30pm to check in and I was still asked to wait so that they can check if the room is ready, i.e for the room that's supposed to be ready at 3pm. Further, on request to check out slightly late, no courtesy from the hotel staff to check if it is possible. Water pressure in the bathrooms were appalling. TV's channel selections were bad. At the age of Netflix and Amazon prime, this hotel still rolls with a few pathetic channels. Time for an upgrade.

Review about two years ago:-
Honestly I have no complaints. Everything is nearby and there is parking provided. Breakfast not so rara as others commented tho.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: kyo sun
text: Selva特別棒的服務 非常熱情的男孩
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Sally Pham
text:
Let’s be honest, it’s a very reasonable price so you can’t expect the world. It is a little rough around the edges (edge of pool decking coming away, very dusty shelves in the wardrobe and around bed and top of the shower head, a dodgy exterior door which actually locked me out on the balcony one afternoon, a little wallpaper peeling in the hallway - not surprised with the humidity - and the typical 3* hotel black silicone in the shower/flooding bathroom when you have a shower). BUT, the hospitality is outstanding. We had such fantastic service.

Selva greeted us every day with a huge smile and always got a ball out for our son to play with in the pool. If you ever needed anything, it came quickly. There were several ladies in the hotel who were so kind, always playing with our son; Ling on reception was one of them. The breakfast room supervisor was another. Our son wanted to leave each of them a note when we left, he grew so fond of them and called them all his friends. The security on the doors were forever there, opening and closing doors for guests with a smile and were so polite. The breakfast is very, very good, and the location is excellent too. It’s next to a very good food court, and the restaurants and ice cream shop in Beach St Courtyard just next door were good. One of our taxi drivers recommended the food court to us as one of the better ones, so vouched for by a local too. We had a 3 year old and an elderly parent and the location was perfect for our non-walkers, as it was easy to get Grab. Me and my husband are walkers and most places you could reach within 15 minutes, but in the belting heat the taxis were a welcome relief.

The beds and pillows are something I usually struggle with in hotels but they were super comfortable here. Overall we were so happy with our stay and would gladly stay here again!
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: simon leadbitter
text:
This is a lovely piece too say.  We came by ferry and it’s about 6 mins to walk from the ferry/bus station
When you come out the station turn right
The hotel it’s self is in a great place to explore the old town
The room was a great size
The breakfast had had a huge selection and was very tasty.
We had some amazing street food as we walked around the town.
We visited the Penang Hill funicular railway.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Suriya
text:
Thank you to Jey Jey today for going out of his way to accommodate my mom. Mom was not happy with being seated at the main entryway of the Ramadhan buka puasa buffet. Jey Jey later on helped find a table that made my mom happy. He knew who the real boss was, the mom, and took action to make her comfortable. When mom is happy, everyone else is happy too.

Food had local favourites such as tapai, lemang, ketupat palas, pucuk rendang. Tapi took time to refill. The nice teh tarik also needed a refill by 8.30pm.
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Amir Nur Zahin Gunawan
text:
Great Location, Decent Stay, but Needs Improvement

I recently stayed at Royale Chulan The Curve and had a decent experience overall. The location is great, with easy access to The Curve, IPC, and 1 Utama malls, making it very convenient for shopping and dining. The staff were friendly and accommodating, which made the stay more pleasant.

The room was clean, but not too clean it was generally okay, but I noticed some areas that could have been better maintained. The facilities feel a bit outdated, and some minor fixes, like the TV and bathroom fittings, could improve the experience.

Overall, it’s a reasonable choice if you value location, but don’t expect a spotless or modern stay.

name: Charmaine Lim
text:
We stayed on 13th February for a few nights room 304 & 311. Good experience.
Then we decided to return and stayed for 2 more nights on 28th February room 505, 804 & 805.
To our horror, we were covered with rashes on our bodies and legs after both nights, the shower head was disgusting covered in black dirt and water flow is low due to leaking. Bedsheets stained and smelly pillows. We asked for housekeeping at the front desk and also with extra hand towels twice together with a reminder to the housekeeper of total 3x before we got what we want. Although the housekeeping is friendly, but we don't like the hygiene of our rooms.
To our latest experience, we weren't sure whether we should recommend Royale Chulan The Curve to our friends on the future. Although we stayed in Royale Chulan Damansara before coming to the curve. We personally find that other than the Royale Chulan Damansara is a bit run down but the rest win Royale Chulan The Curve. We hope the management can put in more efforts in all perspective on managing the hotel especially the rooms are the most important to welcome guests and returning guests.

Asked for room cleaning,hand towel and floor mat was not supply on two days! Feel that standard has deteriorated already.Hotel breakfast was even worst,the shredded carrots tasted sour,food was not top up ( like Lempeng ) in time, I had to remind the staff to do it for few times but no actions taken at all until I gave up!! What a petty hotel.

No free carpark nor at least a flat rate carpark fare for hotel guest. The fare is equivalent to the Mall fare.

Extra request for towel, pillow or other room items will be charged. No issue to charge the pantry items but i find charging for other items are unnecessary.

The room is not clean, especially under the bed and the carpet stinks bad. The room facilities like the phone, TV and furnitures are outdated. The worst part is you have to whatsapp chat the hotel reception if you seek for help/request such as bellboy service since the room phone is not working.

This review is fair since the room fare is not cheap either. You can find other nearby hotels with the same good location with cheaper rate and way better amenities.

What year we live in again?
