title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Tim
text:
Wow, what a really bad experience from start to finish! Be warned - this was surely one of the worst hotels we’ve ever seen in our extensive travels across Asia.

1. We lost a full afternoon of exploring KL as it took them literally two hours to finally honour our paid and confirmed Agoda booking (and assign us a disgusting room, more on that below). In the meantime, we had to wait in the lobby and chase down four different levels of managers, facing all sorts of attempts to fob us off. Initially, they plainly refused to accommodate us at all. It was only after we insisted to stay that they tried to downgrade us to a four-star hotel somewhere else. Lengthy discussions followed, after which it was suddenly questioned that we had even paid our booking. And then the foreigners’ tax. After (literally) running after different front desk managers, duty managers, room division managers for two hours and showing multiple times our booking confirmation plus proof of payment plus proof of payment of foreigners’ tax, we were finally assigned a room. We were then told that they often had problems with Agoda bookings - but is that the way to deal with a recurring problem then? On the back of your customers? Also, they didn’t proactively offer any sort of compensation for the ordeal and the loss of valuable holiday time - only our insistence ultimately led to them giving us a dinner in the hotel restaurant.

2. To add insult to injury, the room we were assigned was a total disgrace (see pictures). Run down, dark, dirty and with a breathtakingly bad smoke smell. Stained sheets, stained carpets, dirt on the floor, dirt and hair on the bathroom floor, loose appliances, mold… We immediately returned to the reception and spoke again to their room divisions manager. Afterwards, we were given an upgrade to a suite.

3. The suite itself was in a better condition than the first room, apart from some stained bed sheets. However, it was quite noisy from the street, so the sleep quality was mediocre at best. To top it all off, we discovered a dead cockroach on the floor in the morning.

We had hoped for a pleasant five-star accommodation in traditional Malay style in a prime location of KL. What we got at the Royale Chulan was an absolute service nightmare, a lot of frustration and a proof of how shabby and dirty their actual rooms are, with even the suites in dubious sanitary conditions. As a consequence, we would strongly advise anyone against choosing this hotel as there are so many better options around.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: I stayed for two nights in December. The room was clean and comfortable, the staff were attentive and friendly, and the location was perfect for exploring the city. However, the breakfast options could be more varied. Overall, I had a pleasant stay and would recommend it.

text: Great place

name: Jane Christmas
text: Absolutely fabulous! Everything about this hotel is wonderful. We stayed here for 7 nights and had a very comfortable stay. Our room was nice,spacious,spotlessly clean with a very comfy bed. As soon as you walk in you are made to feel very welcome and the atmosphere is one of a happy,well run place. The staff in the breakfast room,work particularly hard always pleasant with a smile and good morning. Special mention to the resturant manager who every morning,as soon as he saw my husband and I,came over with a jug of hot water for our tea.  He clocked on very early on this is what we have and every day it was there. It was a particularly busy time whilst we were there as it was Chinese new year and the hotel was very full. The lady who allocates the tables,keeping everything flowing,ensuring people are waiting long for a table,does a brilliant job,always with a smile. Their is plenty of choice for breakfast and despite it being a very busy room,everything is replenished and kept clean to a high standard. The staff are efficient, friendly, helpful, pleasant,everything you could want and the location is perfect.  I cannot praise this hotel highly enough. Thank you for making our stay so perfect. 💖

name: WJ Kang
text:
가성비 괜찮은 숙소입니다. 가격은 많이 비싸지 않은데 넓고 쾌적합니다. 호텔도 큼직하고, 방도 넉넉한 크기 입니다. 직원분들도 친절하고 좋았습니다.

다만 주위에 공원말고는  암것도 없어서, 그랩타고 나가셔야합니다.

조식도 먹었는데, 음식 깔끔하고 괜찮았습니다. 저는 8층에 숙박했는데, 룸에서 보는 뷰도 괞찮았습니다.

침대는 살짝 단단했는데 저는 괜찮았습니다. 다만 방음이 좀 약한것 같아요.
title: Royale Chulan Seremban

your staff Mr Shan found it & gave to Ms Ravie for safekeeping. i cant express my gratitude to you for your honesty and service. thank you

name: Trip.com Member
text: Love the smell and mostly when am check in at Royale chulan I will get the room attached with bathip but in Royale chulan the curve its only shower but the hotel is neat n clean ❤️❤️ it
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Trip.com Member
text: Good and fast service.Friendly staffs
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Trip.com Member
text: A very good hotel that is old but aged well.  We stayed at the Family Suite.  Facilities are well maintained and very clean.   Aircon functions well and no weird smell.  A few hiccups like missing safe in the wardrobe but was promptly resolved.  Some stuff need repair like the sliding doors and the shower head but I can overlook that as the overall ambience of the room is great.  Location is excellent. 3 shopping malls within walking distance: The Curve, IPC, IKEA.   Kidzania is also nearby.    Breakfast is average and good enough for us.
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Jereni Ann
text: First time came here but never regret because it's was so fabulous and top notch all the services and food. Prema assisted us very well, she is so kind and humble receiving customers. Another five stars for all the staff. Will come again.
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Trip.com Member
text: 不得不说这是我近几年国外酒店住宿，体验感最差的一次，在吉隆坡将近500人民币的酒店，不算低了吧。酒店位置一般，附近堵车严重；进入酒店就有一股难以忍受的陈旧气味，可能是脏旧地毯散发出的臭味，我们当场马上联系平台退单，平台说需要联系酒店申请退单，结果酒店前台对平台回信表示不同意退单，因为订单下面的小字写了不退不改，感觉严重欺骗了，酒店实际设施和图片严重不符；更糟糕的是房间设施，一进门依然是臭的，床单被罩都是污渍斑驳，洗不干净的样子，房间没有顶灯，只有几盏昏暗的台灯，看电脑都刺眼；桌子凳子柜子都感觉是旧货市场买的，脏兮兮的，快散架了；说好的大床房，结果是两张小床拼的，前台态度恶劣，竟然说要等有人退出大床房才能更换；卫生间玻璃门每次开关时能发出类似爆炸的砰砰声，我都怕玻璃门碎了；马桶盖是坏的，冲水非常小，半天冲不干净；洗手池下水盖子也是坏的，洗衣服就别想了；再说早餐，早餐厅竟然如此小，种类也很少，转几圈找不到想吃的东西；酒店服务人员态度也不行，我们想问一下路，刚开口，服务员就说听不懂，我也不知道你说的地方；房间密封不好，潮气很大，隔音也差；我总体感觉，这个酒店唯一拿得出的优点，是紧邻一个商场，吃饭购物比较方便。不及格都是表扬，实话说零分酒店！！！
title: Royale Chulan Damansara

name: NK
text: Seminar..seminar
title: Royale Chulan Damansara

name: Jin Siang Tan
text: Old Hotel, got that rustic feel, the hotel H like shape design confusing especially if got emergency, service can be improved since it's so called 5 stars, the again the price value is good too, next to MRT is one of the main selling points

text: Overall, the hotel is suitable for our family, and we appreciated the festive Christmas decorations. However, I hope the hotel can improve the lobby restroom facilities, as some of the toilets were not functioning properly.

name: Sahira Al-Fattah
text:
My only complaint is I got bitten by bedbugs during my stay. I woke up in the middle of the night because my body was so itchy. The morning after my 2nd night I got even more new bites on my body and I was sure it was the bed. I was rushing in the morning so I couldn't take the time to hunt for the bedbug hiding spot.

I made a complaint but it was only met with they'll bring it up to the manager.

text: An overnite staycation in Seremban.

name: daniel chien ewe
text: Very bad parking system and narrow car park drive way   . Stacked in the parking lot for 1 hour plus  after dinner .
title: Royale Chulan Seremban

name: Muhammad Hilmi bin Hamka
text: The interior and experience was okay, but the parking was hell. Cashless parking but only accepts TouchnGo. Sign board said it can accept visa, master card, etc. but in actual only can accept touch n go, and if want to use other payment methods, then need to go back to lobby which is far and ridiculous. The camera also could not detect properly the plate number, and car need to reverse and go several times.
title: Royale Chulan Seremban

name: secret Lim
text: 不错
title: Royale Chulan Seremban

name: Azri Ismail
text:
Booked directly from website and managed to get a good price (considering it is a 4-star hotel). However, even with the attractive pricing, I'm not satisfied due to the following unacceptable reasons:
1.  Room is not ready even though I checked in at 4pm. had to wait almost half an hour before I can enter room. Another family of mine had to wait 2 hours!
2.  Food was terrible. We had group dinner at hotel restaurant (approx. 20pax). For unknown reason, all the chicken dishes are under-cooked (chicken chop, chicken rice etc.). Breakfast buffet is also mediocre, not much taste, not much choice, some drinks has cockroachy smell, half boil eggs has rotten taste (I had stomachache after eating).
3.  Room service is terrible. The cleaning crew only came at 7PM! They only emptied out the trash cans. The wet towels and floor mats were not replaced. I had called the concierge to get replacement towels and was assured they will send new towels, but it never actually came.
4. Room is filthy. I found few small cockroaches in the room. The quilt is dirty, the stains are very visible if you look closely.
title: Royale Chulan Seremban

name: Trip.com Member
text: Was okay. I love all the facilities. But just one problem which is i got a room with anak lipas here and there. They sent their staff to came and spray but still anak lipas muncul
title: Royale Chulan Seremban

name: Trip.com Member
text: As this is an executive room , it’s a big and very comfortable place. Only disappointing item is the executive club lounge where it is supposed to be exclusive but it has limited food. Staff would also recommend to go to the lobby to have our breakfast. Curated eggs is limited to 2 types instead of guest request.
title: Royale Chulan Seremban

name: Trip.com Member
text: It was very pleasant as the staff are very helpful.

text: Puas hati view dia puas hati harga murah

name: Trip.com Member
text: 看点评分数不是很高但是实际入住体验很好，老牌酒店服务很好，设施不算最新但是看得出也是翻新过的，该有的都有了。出门进门都有人帮忙拉门，也会礼貌打招呼，早餐也很丰富。定的家庭套房适合一家三口。
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Housekeeping services was excellent , my toilet smell of urine when we entered. Carpet not properly vacuum.The hotel was one of my favourite place to stay, those day I can said they was one of the best .
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: 韓韓
text:
2024.12月底時入住，覺得最大的問題還是清潔度，希望透過評論，飯店能重視消毒程序。

入住時檢查房間，房間沒有打掃很乾淨，很多地方有灰塵，浴室有黴，但大部分地毯什麼的看起來還算乾淨
床看起來好像也蠻乾淨的，但後來隔天我右腳腳背和腳踝出現一堆小紅點，再隔一天換左腳腳背也出現一堆紅點，不摸它們的話不會特別發癢，所以不知道是不是蟎蟲咬的，也有可能是蜘蛛? (但沒看到蜘蛛，醒著時也沒有被爬的感覺)

(很抱歉讓大家看被叮咬一堆包的腳背)

住到第三天早上，房間出現從門口爬進來翻肚的小蟑螂(只是翻肚但沒死)，我真的要嚇死

房間還有其他缺點：
1.最致命的是馬桶沖水水量過大，不壓緊馬桶蓋的話水會濺出來外面，即使有壓住馬桶蓋，水還是會噴在馬桶座上（我覺得好髒）

2.吹風機超級小風，要花3倍時間吹

優點是早餐很豐盛，但房況假如沒改善我不會敢再住第二次
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 如大家所说，前台服务员态度极差，过年期间，订了两个房间，住的二楼，开不了窗，窗外刚好又是设备机器，及其吵，而且潮湿臭，一整晚无法入睡。由于入住当天女儿发烧感冒，人非常不舒服，就没有要求换房间了，第二天早上去前台要求换房间，一男前台态度超差，不让换，还说会让人上门检查，实际上完全没人去检查，后面我们说这个房间无法住人，沟通期间，前台明显不耐烦，还小声用英语骂人，出门这么多年第一次遇到这样的服务，人都傻了，我们正常的要求无法处理，还骂人….为了不影响旅行心情，家人说算了，随便对付一晚，第二天换酒店….
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Hariz Haikal
text: “I visited last month, and overall, it was an exceptional experience—except for the parking situation. The food was absolutely exquisite, bursting with rich flavors that left a lasting impression. Huge credit to the talented chef and the incredible kitchen team for their outstanding culinary craftsmanship. I was truly amazed by the quality and presentation of each dish, and a special shoutout to Sous Chef Hafeez for his remarkable expertise. Thank you, Chulan, for a memorable dining experience! I’ll definitely be back soon. Highly recommended!”
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: B.R. de Bree
text: One off the best hotel ever.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 早餐不错，时间长。服务却一般，设施太老旧了，第一晚的浴室用完水漏到走廊一摊水，一开始还想让我将就说没有多余房间里，后来又说可以给我换一个了，没有任何歉意和补偿。 服务人员基本没有笑脸，甚至感觉不太友好。
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: vivi hipo
text: Mr.Selva, who was taking care of the pool and gym. He is friendly and attentive 💯
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Peng Tatt Lim
text: Buffet lunch was good. The ambiance was good for gathering with friends and family. Price is reasonable.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: QASEH IRYS MOHD NORLIZAM
text:
I love Georgetown. The whole town is a colossal museum for me. The old architecture, the historical spots, the combination of geography and nature is something always calling me back for another exploration.

Royale Chulan is another colonial heritage building with its own story. Old is gold some might say. Highly walkable to nearby spots and eateries, you'll find it a good decision to stay here. But of course, nothing is perfect. However, I had a pleasant experience during my stay here.

4.1~4.4⭐ from me.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Hans Hayaki
text: Rohim from the restaurant is truly a gem in hospitality. He goes the extra mile to ensure the comfort of the guests, and knows the guest by name, and by far, the only staff who greeted us a happy cny. Happy to have met him at breakfast, as he made the stay a wonderful one. Hope the hotel would have more people like him.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: zs
text:
Came here and went to the swimming pool, pool and gym manager Selva was doing his job very well keeping the place clean, and being very friendly and welcoming to all of us
5 stars to that guy!
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Zi My
text: Best housekeeping mesra alam ...servis bagus
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 酒店客房十分陈旧，蚂蚁窝．．．服务一言难尽
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Traditional old school hotel. Professional staff. Clean throughout. Good breakfast
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: rai ratna
text: The food was amazing and we met the chef there chef hafiz he is so amazing his knowledgeable about food are so outstanding please keep the great work chef hafiz and he also has very good service when and sense of humour really make us happy and laugh thank you chulan and thank you chef hafiz
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Yen-hsin Li (Busman)
text: 轉換插座+延長線是必須帶的
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Zol Zzz
text: Delicious
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 1. Great LocationThe hotel is very well located, close to a large shopping mall with plenty of food options nearby, which is very convenient.2. Convenient TransportationThe hotel is very close to the MRT station, making it very easy to get around, whether for travel or shopping.3. Decent CleanlinessThe cleanliness of the hotel is acceptable, but I hope the hotel can consider providing face towels, which would enhance the guest experience. 3. Old FurnitureI understand that this hotel has a long history, but the furniture in the rooms is too outdated and needs to be updated and maintained.4. Iron IssueThe provided iron has a burnt surface, which severely affects its usability and even stained my clothes. I suggest the hotel replace the iron promptly.5. Poor Sound InsulationThe sound insulation between rooms is poor. At night, I could hear the sounds of the couple next door making love, which disturbed my rest. I recommend the hotel improve its soundproofing measures.Overall, the hotel's location and transportation are its biggest advantages, but there is room for improvement in terms of facility maintenance, sound insulation, and guest experience.
title: Royale Chulan Damansara

name: Mimi Zailani
text: The room is spacious. Breakfast overall is great. Lots of choices and tasted good especially the mac and cheese for me
title: Royale Chulan Damansara

name: Trip.com Member
text: 房间还可以，就是有点旧，刚进来有股潮湿的味道，毕竟是老酒店，可以理解。被褥还算干净，说是5星，应该达不到。吐槽下携程软件，越看价格越高，提前一天定比当天订还贵了50多，利用大数据杀熟，真是太会赚钱了。
title: Royale Chulan Damansara

name: Trip.com Member
text: The checkin and check out was very smooth, friendly staff. Buffet breakfast, lunch & tea break was superb, good food.
title: Royale Chulan Damansara

name: NUR AMIRA BINTI MOHD NASIR
text: The hotel is indeed beautiful and clean. We went here from 27-28 June 2024. The room is clean including the toilet. Staff are friendly and assistive including the housekeeping staff. The foods are good especially for breakfast. Only thing to be improved is the kids club. They have a kids club but it seems abandoned. Please revamp the kids club. Its a loss since you have a space but didnt utilise it. Although its empty with broken toys, my kids still tried to entertain themselves there for a good 20 Minutes.
title: Royale Chulan Damansara

name: Trip.com Member
text: No more free parking, it's RM4 per day.There is no linkbridge to the curve mall for now, think adjacent building is closed.Body foam no more, never refill, but was quick to reply my request to top up.Room was clean, spacious, looks grand.Tv abit small, 29inch and not clear but had paid channels like axn, astro sports etcBreakfast was good, both local and international spread with cakes muffins egg station etc, child had breakfast for free too. Missed out my order for eggs and the chef took his own sweet time though he apologised
title: Royale Chulan Damansara

name: Trip.com Member
text: The location is considered convenient. However, the overall ambient is abit dated.
title: Royale Chulan Damansara

name: Trip.com Member
text: 有点儿旧，但标准还在，整体不错
title: Royale Chulan Damansara

name: Trip.com Member
text: Selesa, kemas dan bersih. Recommended
title: Royale Chulan Damansara

name: Trip.com Member
text: 每次到吉隆坡都住这家，房间大，国内插座也可以用，卫生也很好，价格实惠，最主要的是离地铁近，非常好！
title: Royale Chulan Damansara

name: Trip.com Member
text: 酒店隔壁有宜家，和几个超市，吃饭购物都很方便，酒店服务和早餐都很好，除了设施旧点，其他都没毛病
title: Royale Chulan Damansara

name: Trip.com Member

name: Aims AAMS
text: Sidewalk cafe and food outlet. Alternative to hotel restaurant.

name: Noor Syuhada
text:
Smooth check in and check out process. I had some minor issues in my hotel room but what I would like to highlight here is the quick actions by the staff ( reception,engineer, housekeeper ).

What makes me feel like coming back is the great customer service by Mr.Ismail. The moment I entered the lobby area, he greeted me. Very courteous and friendly. I’d remember his lovely smile and his Malaysian hospitality.

Thank you Royale Chulan Damansara for making my stay memorable!

The room was spacious and clean and well equipped with iron, hair dryer and extra pillow. The breakfast is superb too. Endless food! There is playroom for child but maybe in future can add more toys pleasee. The swimming pool also great. Will come again next time☺️

name: Pascal H
text: Warnung - Grosse Entäuschung bei der Zimmerwahl. Anstelle eines Superior Zimmers habe ich mich auf Booking für das teurere und grössere Deluxe Zimmer entschieden. Erhalten habe ich dann aber das kleinere Zimmer obwohl ich für das teurere bezahlt habe. Der arrogante Chef de Reception ging trotz Reklamation nicht darauf ein. Behauptet weiterhin ich hätte das Deluxe, obschon die Fotos auf Booking klare Worte sprechen. Selbst die verantwortliche Person des Cleaning Teams hat mir recht gegeben. Er könnte wenigstens ehrlich sein anstatt mir ins Gesicht zu lügen. Absolute Sauerei !! 125 Ringit einfach in den Sand gesetzt. So einem Receptionist müsste sofort gekündigt werden. Ich werde der Hotelleitung schreiben und mich auch dort beklagen.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 我们订了两个豪华双床房连住三晚，分别是513/515房，因为我们是晚上到达的航班，入住后就首先洗澡准备睡个懒觉缓解一天路上的疲惫；但是，当我们准备睡觉时，发观房间里面有一种高频噪音，简直无法入睡。于是到前台诉苦，让值班经理上来感受一下，并要求换个安静的房间，他说查查看是否有房间，于是换了三楼的，比较好了。我们另一房间的朋友次日要求挨房，他们都是整个晚上没法入睡，但是，前台的一个胖子男生说要下午三点才能有房，我们上午出去，中午回来想休息，问是否可以换房了，这个胖子男生坚持说要三点后才能挨。我们后来问前台另一个女坐，她很友善地说可以，房间早上就准备好了。卫生方面，看看附图我用酒糟湿巾抹床头柜后的颜色吧！泳池不错，早餐富有特色。
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Susan Casipit
text: The hotel is epitome of luxury and comfort at our 4 star hotel, where impeccable cleanliness meets cloud-like comfort in every bed. The staff, the heart of hospitality, radiates warmth and friendliness, setting the gold standard for top-notch service. Our stay is not just recommended; it's a glowing testament to an unparalleled experience that exceeds all expectations.

name: Mohanraj S.Sekar
text:
Stayed here recently. I have been a fan of the Royale Chulan hotels, but this particular branch was quite disappointing. While staffs were courteous and professional, the rooms weren’t up to the standards of Royale Chulan.

I like the room designs and theme, it’s a bit old school and has character and charm. But it’s worn out and not well kept. The carpets were worn out, the wardrobe doors were too difficult to push/pull, the leather on the chair torn, the stool missing a tufted button, the table lamp cracked and wobbly, the sink clogged and slow to drain. I have had better experience at their other branch. This one is in dire need for an update, or some TLC.

Worthy to note, from 1/7/2024 they charge an RM4 fee per day for parking.
title: Royale Chulan Damansara

name: Trip.com Member
text: Well, it’s Chulan, so all are at par, the ambience and facility are well kept, the staff is nice, and the food is great ( both room service and breakfast), i had nice rest.

name: Anonymous
text:
Maybe it used to be 5stars, but no longer is. Bed is nice, but others: Broken wall plug, broken shower head, chair with torn leather, leaking steam iron. Feels like a 2stars experience.

As for breakfast, nasi goreng & mee goreng tasted bland. Vegetable soup tasted like salt water. Royale chulan damansara is way way wayy better.

Only good thing is the customer service. Kudos to the dedicated frontstaff.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Ash Booth (& Penny Clements)
text:
I recently stayed at Royale Chulan and found it to be a bit of a mixed experience. The hotel's location is good, within walking distance to many central attractions, which is a real plus. Our room was a good size and comfortable, although it did take longer than expected for housekeeping to service it each day... 5/6pm! The front-of-house staff were friendly, though we did experience some issues with our room key, which after two attempts to get right we gave up.

However, there were several areas that let the hotel down. Alcohol is no longer available at the hotel, which came as a surprise. The pool area, while nice and quiet in the day, lacked any kind of drink service and had very few loungers with cushions, making it less inviting for a relaxing day. Another issue was that the photos on the website no longer reflect the reality - views of the Petronas Towers from the pool are now blocked by construction, and new photos should be taken to update this as you can’t see them even just a little bit.

The breakfast buffet was a chaotic experience. It was overcrowded, with guests being rude and staff struggling to keep up - we had to grab a table immediately after someone left and the staff wouldn’t change our cutlery / napkins.  We also found the complimentary water in the room to be limited to just four small bottles per day, which felt a bit stingy considering you can’t drink the tap water. Overall, the hotel feels dated and tired, and while it may have been a 4- or 5-star property in the past, it now seems more like a 3-star experience. It has potential but is in need of renovation, love and better service to live up to expectations.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: pavin wilson
text: Breakfast was ok
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

text: we have lunch buffet at chulan corner

name: Taska Hawary
text: Nice hotel
title: Royale Chulan Damansara

name: Tucker
text:
I recently stayed at a charming hotel from the 90s, and the experience was quite nostalgic. The hotel features many classic designs that bring back memories of a bygone era. The room was spacious, the bed was huge and incredibly comfortable, which made for a great night's sleep. I was also impressed with the strong water pressure in the shower room, making showers refreshing.

One of the standout features of this hotel is the pool, which offers a stunning view of the Damansara skyline. It's a perfect spot to relax and unwind, adding significant value to the property.

Overall, my stay was satisfying. However, there are a couple of areas where the hotel could improve. The reception staff could be more welcoming; a simple smile during check-in and check-out would greatly enhance the guest experience. Additionally, I noted an ant infestation in the room, which is a matter that needs urgent attention from the hotel management.

For those planning to drive, please be aware that parking costs RM4 per day for in-house guests.
title: Royale Chulan Damansara

name: Zai Zawawi
text: great breakfast for 29.90
title: Royale Chulan Damansara

name: 不滅のアりエル
text:
Came here with my family for vacation. The room we stayed in had a faulty aircond, so we had to change to another room. The other room was in worse condition, with the paint coming off the walls and the doors made a screeching sound. The facilities given were also underwhelming, especially the Kiddie Land.

The breakfast was excellent, though, and there's a link bridge straight to The Curve, IKEA and the MRT close by. The hotel is fine overall, but it needs some renovations, especially the halls.
title: Royale Chulan Damansara

name: Rosidi Ahmad
text: First impression after entering my room, I noticed the wear and tear of the room from the lower section of the room. A few of the floor tiles are waiting to pop out judging from the sound the make every time you step on them. In summary it's not well maintained. For the first time in my entire hotel experience, this the1st 5 star hotel which their room service staff had forgotten to restock the most important toiletry needs: no bath towels or hand towels found. Perhaps they should hire a better housekeeping staff. To top if off, I had to call housekeeping twice to get them. Of course I only got the bath towels. Still missing hand towels.

name: Satou Ulaao
text:
飯店櫃檯人員&房務人員友善
早餐餐廳的服務人員較散漫
房間內天花板跟地板會漏水
第一天就會漏
原以為也無解.最後一晚才跟櫃檯說
（避免被誤會是我們破壞的）
結果房務人員拿機器來把水抽走就解決了漏水問題
房內迎賓橘色膽敢偏乾吃起來普通
飯店偏舊.隔音不錯算安靜.
房間大寬敞.可選擇是否要打掃
不小心按到 不打擾的燈就不會打掃了
也不會放新的水.可跟前台要水
盥洗用品還不錯用
位置有點偏
看評論表示早餐豐富才選擇入住
結果吃一次就不太想再吃了
感覺是2.3星飯店的早餐
餐廳人員不積極.幾乎只能吃餐台上溫冷的食材
負責烤餅的人員不太願意現點現做給我們
烤餅好吃但四天只等到一次現烤的烤餅
調好的咖啡每天甜度不一樣
第一天最好喝.第三天太甜
title: Royale Chulan Penang

text: 老式酒店，住着还算舒服。小朋友喜欢泳池，每天要去玩3次以上。位置非常好，吃的逛的都只需要步行，总的来说体验不错。
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 非常好，很满意
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: The price was reasonable but I felt the service and cleanliness was not up to standard of a 4 star hotel. The hotel room was big, although it was aged. It had a sofa and separate room for Wardrobe and luggage. But the Aircon was weak, which made my stay uncomfortable. The temperature seems to be controlled by the hotel as it would always feel like 24-25 degrees no matter how low I set it. The corridors are also very hot and stuffy. Only the lobby has proper Aircon. The shower drainage was also poor and the toilet bidet is leaking. The safe box is spoiled and the Wardrobe doors don’t slide well. The bed linens had small stains and small hairs. The housekeeping staff need better training as they didn’t clean the room properly or replenish the amenities completely. One staff also chose to hold the lift, while I was inside, to mop the floor. I understand he was just doing his job, but he shouldn’t do it at the inconvenience of hotel guests. Front desk staff and cafe staff are very good though.   The breakfast buffet was average, but no Penang dishes at all. Swimming pool is small but cozy and water is nice.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 不知道哪来这么多好评，房间老化那个味道 睡觉都入脑，房间老化到不行。这个价钱根本没性价比，真的不行

name: Ali Alkindi
text: مكان رائع يستحق الزيارة
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 立地がよかったと思います少し早目に到着したのですが、部屋に入れてもらえましたまた、機会があれば泊まりたいと思います
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: Love to stay hereClassic deco as the hotel is pretty much oldBreakfast was okay with several selections Room size was big and i was upgraded to club room
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 挺不错的地方，早餐丰盛又好吃
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 酒店全是印度人，看样子是清真的。有一些广式点心，不少各种咖喱和印度飞饼。设施比较老旧了。而且离商区需要过一个大马路。
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: Old hotel room has old house smell. Good location good breakfast, service and stuff are good.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Eng Yang Khoo (EY Khoo)
text: Does not serve food selection as advertised for Christmas lunch. Parking is really bad. Have to park in 3rd party parking lot. Taste of food is good for its price. Service at lunch is good.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Excellent Service staff
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Reuben Tan
text: My beef is with the staff at the cafe. My family and I were not shown to our table for our breakfast, only told to go to a table on the right by the staff at the entrance. I am not sure if there was a staff to lead us to the table, and if there was one, she was walking like 10 steps ahead of us without turning to see if we were following her. I was therefore not sure where our table was but I saw an empty one being cleaned by a staff but when we reached the table, that staff who was cleaning the table then told us the table was already reserved or taken by someone else. However, I didn’t see anyone else waiting to sit there. So I asked her where our table would be since we were told to go in. She then said    In a not so polite way that they would look for another table for us. The staff who seemed to be the one supposed to lead us was also clueless if we were the ones.  After some time, maybe after checking with staff at the entrance, she nodded her head from afar, and I was not sure what that meant and the staff who was cleaning the table just left us like that, so I presume that table was indeed ours. Such a strange and unpleasant experience that left me wondering if we were really in the wrong. As far as I am concerned, I did not enter the cafe without being let in by the staff, and I wasn’t till now told if that table was really meant for us, only told that it was meant for some other guests who were nowhere to be seen
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: The room, breakfast and overall experience was generally excellent.Room make up was a little shoddy, always missing some towels.For the poolside and gym service, when the regular attendant was on duty (selva?) everything was tip top. But when he was on leave, there were no towels and no one was around to ask for help
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: staff kt customer service kna lbih friendly bru customer rasa selesa..parking kena bayar yaa 😆
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Sharifah Ibrahim
text: Table arrangement very near for breakfast. Varieties of foods but the food counter scattered around. Flat rate parking for hotel guest at rm5. Strategic location within walking distances to heritage old town and food.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Benjamin Farah
text: Should be 4.5 stars. Stayed here 4 times or so. Rooms showing their age but functional. Lots of breakfast options. Location is great.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Adzli Shaferul Ramli
text: Very good location in the middle of Penang, you can walk to little India, padang esplanade and a lot of good Kedai makan like Kapitan, Nasi Kandar Merlin, Ais Tingkap, Nasi kandar beratur, etc all at walking distances. The hospitality is recommended with friendly staffs willing to assist you anytime. Room is spacious with nice view over seeing the jetty. Will surely revisit the hotel.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Nur Dalila Harun
text:
Lokasi dekat dengan padang kota..
Bilik sangat bersih
Service tiptop..
Breakfast sedap
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: I stayed with my husband and two kids in a superior room.It has ample parking. The parking area is a multiple level building opposite the hotel. The parking area has lift.The room is spacious. Ample space to perform prayer. It has a separate shower and toilet area.Iron is provided.The hotel is accessible to many tourist spots.To improve 1. Cleanliness My room has multiple spots of dust on the carpet There is stain on the toilet bowl.2 . Breakfast BuffetThere is variety of food but I was provided with papercup, we have to wait for the cup due to large crowd.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: abdul ansari
text: Very nice and cozy stay near the Penang jetty. Excellent rooms and a lovely breakfast spread..
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: hamza 17
text: loved the room i didn't expect to be this big, amazing, and strong WiFi helped to do my work without any issue. Also, the view is to the sea where i can see the ships park at the jetty, very walkable hotel to nearby attractions in gorge town.. check-in was so smooth, price is standard
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Mimi Siew
text: The room is big, a little retro, very clean, and very quiet.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Rekha Balasubramaniam
text: Location, service, food, environment... Everything was good. Specially the door service staff and front desk staff very helpful and kind. Highly recommended
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 房間屬於典雅型，設施齊備，除了風筒之外連熨鬥和熨衫板也有。地點位置不錯，步行15分鐘已經可以經過少印度去到檳城著名的壁畫影相，酒店正門對出停車場旁邊有一個大排檔，不過只在平日營業。酒店提供的早餐非常豐富。
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 酒店地點十分優越，鄰近地道美食非常近，不到一分鐘腳程！去姓氏橋也十分近，約10分鐘腳程左右，這邊也有地道風味餐廳，但係不要有太高祈望。
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: The hotel is right on the main road, but the entrance/lobby is off the road, down an alley.Check in was easy.  I requested early check in at 2pm, showed up at 1:15 and was still accommodated which was nice.  The room was nice and clean.  The king bed was very comfortable.  There was no city view from the 4th floor, only the swimming pool.  The buffet breakfast was ok, not great and not terrible.  Overall the Royals Chulan was quite good, I would stay here again.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: SHAHABUDDIN Bin Md Ali Budin Cool
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Karen Tan
text: Everything is good esp Mr Selva who is in charge of the swimming pool and gym is very helpful and friendly and maintained both place clean and enjoyable experience. Thank you
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Yih Hubert
text: 臨近大排檔，吃飯方便，周邊非常多餐廳可供選擇，超商店也近在咫尺。
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: We have our weekend staycation over here to enjoy local food. Very reasonable price, comfortable room and walkable to many places. Highly recommend the Nasi Lemak Breakfast. Staff are ok but less of smile. Anyway, no big issue. Will come back again
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 房间非常好，可以提前入住，可以看到海。房间厕所洗澡分离，只有两条大毛巾，健身房非常干净，24小时开，有饮水机，游泳池非常干净，开到20点，服务人员Selva是残疾人，很勤奋，服务不错，教我用健身器材，看来酒店很照顾，愿意提供残疾人就业前台帮助免费打印，态度好效率很高早餐不错，马来风，咖啡机很慢需要耐心
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: View very nice when breakfast
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: wifi is patchy but place is close to almost everything. Comfortable as well.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Huda Abd
text: Very nice hotel and good place for stay in. Overall i love it ❤️
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Wan Fatima Wan Omar
text: This is my 5th stay at the hotel, always love the place.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Best. Dekat dengan nasi lemak viral, blkg hotel je.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Nice hotel
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: siti hajar ahmad fuad
text: Air pool sejuk
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Colleen MM
text:
Shoutout to Mithu !
The hotel shows its age, but the location is fantastic. Parking was a breeze; we were able to park in the designated bay for all three nights of our stay. However, the bathroom had an unpleasant urine smell coming from the wooden door, which I assume is difficult for the cleaners to eliminate. On a brighter note, I want to give a special shoutout to Mithu, the housekeeping attendant, for his warm hospitality and morning greetings. He even folded a towel into a dog shape on our bed and gifted us chocolates—a lovely touch that made our stay memorable.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Iryna Herasymova
text:
Comfortable, clean room, clean bed sheets with a perfect view.
Good location, walk distance to the many tourists spots. Helpful and polite staff. Very testy breakfast with a lot of proposal.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Peter Bond
text:
Schönes altes Hotel in der Altstadt von Penang.  Die Zimmer sind geräumig und zweckmäßig ausgestattet. Die Trennwand zur Dusche war leider undicht. Aber die Toilette war getrennt vom Badezimmer. Wir hatten seitlichen Blick aufs Meer, was Recht schön war. Frühstück ist gewohnt für Malaysia sehr umfangreich. Nur sollte man nicht zu den Stoßzeiten zum Frühstück kommen, dann muß man lange warten bis ein Platz frei wird. Für ein solches Hotel ein "No-Go".
Auch sollten wir beim auschecken noch warten bis sie unser Zimmer kontrolliert haben. Ebenfalls eine No-Go!!!!
Der Pool ist groß und gut gepflegt. Ausreichend Liegen vorhanden.
Der Haupteingang ist der hintere Eingang.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Olivia Kaiser
text: Schönes Hotel im Kolonialstil, unser Zimmer war zweckmäßig eingerichtet und sauber. Allerdings war die Duschkabine undicht und nach einer Dusche stand das Badezimmer unter Wasser. Hatten wir aber auch in anderen Hotels in Malaysia. Das Housekeeping vergisst gern mal Handtücher oder Toilettenpapier, auf Nachfrage bekommt man aber alles. Generell ist der Service sehr freundlich und aufmerksam. Eine grosse Frühstücksauswahl, der grosse Pool und die sehr zentrale Lage sind weitere Pluspunkte.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Ek Chuah
text: services need improvement
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: SIEW
text:
stay for 3 nìghts changed the room three times
first time- smoking smell in all over the room
no matter how they spray the fragrance to cover
second time- horrible non-window room with couldn't closed TV （maintainer cant fix too） so we sleep over whole night with TV on
third time- they let me check the room before i stay
and the aircon sound is quite noisy to disturb my sleep
but I couldn't ask for better room becos I give up

But the building is too old
Breakfast is good but the dining area has strong oil smell
And they don’t allow u to put outside food in their fridge after checkout

The only good part：Reception is always ready and fix our problems
（or maybe they are used to it 🥲）
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: location - quite near to many tourist spotsroom - got a room facing swimming pool and hotel rooms as its balcony's view. not bad.parking - not difficult to find car park, the parking ticket fee was included in the room ratecleanliness - goodfacilities - only managed to visit swimming pool and gym, well maintainedstaffs - friendly and helpful both cleaners and receptionistsadd on single bed (with breakfast) rm90/paxbuffet breakfast - plenty and taste above average, recommended , under 5 is free. only setback - basin's drainage was quite slow
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Bersih dan strategik
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 房间老旧 东西也不怎么好吃
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: Location at the centre of Kuala Lumpur and walking distance to KLCC and within one MRT station to TRX mall. The breakfast spread was great and I really enjoyed it
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: Everything was good- the facilities, customer service and breakfast.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Cecilia Mary Lee
text: Comfortable and huge room
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Dilman D. Maulod
text: So comfortable hotel. Hope visit them again
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 优点1.很大，大厅很大也很有老牌五星的气质，房间也很大。2.门童服务很好，帮忙迎接拿行李送去房间。3.位置很好，市中心，旁边就是百威年商场。不足之处1.早餐以印度和马来为主，少量西式，没有中式。吃的不是非常习惯。2.前台不会中文3.泳池那边空调外机声音巨大，所以几乎不可能在那边呆得住。4.有灶台但是没有锅具和餐具。
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Susanne Carter
text: Beautiful and grand style.  Large rooms.  300m to the Pavilion Shopping Mall which has 700 shops and a 10mins walk to Japan Alor night food market
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: Okokokokok
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Nurul Shadza Ghazali
text: There were so many on the plans but ended up staying in room just bcs my husband and my son were caught with food poisoning from the in room service food that we ordered. Though the hotel staff did send my husband and my son to the hospital, provide the lunch and dinner just to ensure they recover well, but definitely a no to return back here. Burnt MYR 1,600 for 2-night stay just to stay in the room + it was a trip for our son’s birthday. All time wasted just bcs of the food. The hotel name should have actually guarantee the food hygiene but for this one I don’t think so the food hygiene is in place.
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: Trip.com Member
text: Spacious villa.. Big balcony but just beware of wild monkeys
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: Trip.com Member
text: Sofa is spoilt and bathroom floor epoxy paint came off. Surrounding is ok and direct access to beach. Service level acceptable.
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: Sella Doray
title: Royale Chulan Cerating Villa & Chalet (Formerly known as Royale Chulan Cherating)

name: Trip.com Member
text: We enjoy our stay at Royale chulan Penang as its very strategic location. Just use the free bus ride within George town, we can see many historic building and place. We can also use other public bus to go other places as the main bus terminal is just near to the hot.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: This hotel does not serve alcohol or beer. They only provide a very small mini bottle of shampoo and body wash for the shower. Breakfast was quite good although they was only 1 person juggling between the egg station and the noodle station
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Good service from all of the staff.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: all in good condition. thanks for the hospitality. will come again in the future
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Laura Limede
text: Absolutely gorgeous hotel
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Everything is good. My room suitable for 2 kids for 1year 8 months and 3 years. Its spacious and clean.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 酒店建的时间有点早，有些陈旧还有味道，早餐的味道也一般般
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: nurnadhirah
text:
I recently stayed at this hotel for my cousin’s wedding, and it was a very disappointing experience.
1.	When I arrived, I was informed by the receptionist that I had booked two rooms instead of one, even though I was certain I only booked a single room for one night. The same issue happened to my cousin—she booked two rooms but was told she had reserved four. This is completely unacceptable.
2.	There was a minor makeup stain on a towel that could have easily been cleaned with soap, but instead, the cleaner took a photo of it and reported it to the receptionist, who then demanded an extra charge. My sister ended up washing the towel herself, and the stain came off effortlessly. Charging RM45 for something so trivial is ridiculous.
3.	To make matters worse, there was a cockroach in my cousin’s room. This is absolutely unhygienic and disgusting.

I usually enjoy staying at hotels, but this was by far the worst experience I’ve ever had. I will definitely not be returning.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Amira Latiffi
text: Kudos to front desk lady and all staffs for excellent check in and check out process, very attentive to inquiry👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻. Tasty breakfast selection. I would choose this hotel again for breakfast tbh 😝
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 酒店设施有点年代感，但是服务特别好。有一次需要更多毛巾，打了电话服务台马上就送过来。订外卖没有附送餐具，也是酒店服务员特别慷慨地给了好多份餐具。地理位置很棒，去各个景点都是步行距离，很方便。
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: I have a great stay here.. friendly housekeeping staff and the best thing was this hotel smells good along the pathway to the room..
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Mee Fong Cheng
text: The room is neat and clean. The staff are so friendly. We will come again. Thank you for everything, the services are so good.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Mohd Zulsyafiq
text:
1. Hotel yang best untuk stay.
2. Berdekatan padang kota lama.
3. Dekat dengan nasi kandar imigresen, hameediyah dan line clear..
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 1st time stay dekat hotel ni. Bilik yg cantik, bersih dan kemas. Next time boleh booking lg. Berdekatan dengan padang kota. Best.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: The hotel is well-located and reasonably priced, but one thing I found unacceptable was that the receptionist informed me that car parking costs RM8 during check-in, instead of being free for hotel guests
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: The staff are really great and they managed to fulfil our early check in request which we are really appreciative for.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: J L
text: Good Place
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Mamapp a
text: Great ambient and great place for event
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 设施：好。这家酒店的配置也比较好，布局合理。卫生：干净，干湿分区环境：好。地理位置好，离地铁站100多米。服务：很好。早餐也很不错，超赞。比起我现在在吉隆坡住的另一家酒店好太多了
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Aisyah Salleh
text: There were missing items in the toilet such as the non slip mat for bath tub, the tub had issue fo draining. The A/C was the old ducted type so you are unable to control the room temp so this led to being in so an uncomfortable hot environment, even the technician dont know how to fix that. the location wise is fine but the maintenance wise is a no go, i cancel this for a 5 star hotel, experienced a better one in other 5 or 4 star hotels before
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Taufik Jhd
text: A stay at The Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur offers a blend of luxury, comfort, and Malaysian heritage. The hotel's grand architecture and traditional Malay design create an elegant first impression. Guests are greeted with warm hospitality and spacious, well-appointed rooms featuring modern amenities and classic decor. The hotel’s diverse dining options, including authentic local and international cuisines, provide a delightful culinary experience. Its central location offers easy access to major attractions like Pavilion Kuala Lumpur and KLCC. With a serene spa, outdoor pool, and well-equipped facilities for meetings or events, The Royale Chulan is perfect for business or leisure stays.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: The hotel was a bit dated and one the room airconditioning was not working properly. The staff was swift to solve the problem and gave us an upgrade. Breakfast was excellent and the pool is huge.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 来了个印度团双床超售，我们被安排了个套间 一张床的，然后要求加个正常床—安排了个钢丝床 -晚上一夜辗转难测！
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Abu Faris
text: Good hotel with ample sized ballroom to host an event with say, 409-500 pax comfortably. Close to shopping and dining venues - notably the KL Pavilion. Parking lots in the basement were also aplenty. Big reception area.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 吉隆坡市中心，邻近Pavilion购物中心，交通便利。酒店前台服务态度也非常亲切，有任何情况也第一时间协助处理，点赞。
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 酒店位置特别好，走路就能都Pavillion，非常方便
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Mohd Zulkifli Hashim
text:
Beautiful and stunning Malay Architecture
Needs more maintenance at all aspects and some parts should refurbish.
Excellent service from various staff
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: Great place to relax. Convenient to most everyting. Little India, Penang street food and etc.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Horrible front office. Asked us to wait for 15 minutes after check out  just to check on room.  Never again.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Booked for twin bed but was arranged to large bed during check in. Luckily hotel managed to change back to my original booking. (However, I have to show proof :-( ). Room at Level 5 and water pressure is relatively low and it’s time to upgrade your hair dryer.Bfast is normal but the area air circulation needs to be to be improved. After bfast, you whole body is smelly.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 地点和舒适度都很好，已经无数次住在这家酒店。还是那句话，餐厅的抽风机应该提示，吃完早餐衣服有股油烟味。
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: The location of this hotel is very near at the port and you can walk around at Penang. I love to book this hotel since i can grab nasi kandar from various famous nasi kandar nearby. the breakfast is superb but pricey if you want to add on for children which is rm40. the room is very nice and clean, with good service and amenities.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Love the breakfast. the room is spacious too. hotel is nearby and easy to walk to the popular restaurant. like kapitan and pasembor. 5mins walking distance to Esplanade.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: All good. Nice stay with familiy members
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: raido 1363
text:
I recently stayed at the Royal Chulan Hotel and, unfortunately, had a disappointing experience with the bell service. The (local)bell boy’s attitude was noticeably unfriendly, and he seemed indifferent and unapproachable. Each interaction felt uncomfortable due to his lack of manners and distant demeanor, which gave a poor first impression of the hotel.

I hope that the hotel management addresses this issue and provides additional training to ensure that all guests feel warmly welcomed. A friendly and courteous attitude can make such a difference in creating a positive experience for visitors.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Chan Chan Mel
text: 房務人員好用心！謝謝Mr.Mithu還幫我們摺了愛心天鵝，其他地方從沒有這樣過的好服務
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: sir anu
text: Miss. Ayu from the front office was very helpful and supporting. Thanks to her efforts, we had an excellent stay. Thank u very much.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 住宿地點非常的方便，附近很熱鬧、吃東西和交通也都很方便，房間簡單、乾淨，很舒適，是個不錯的住宿選擇。
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Gan Chun Hue
text: Good place.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Jeanie Lau
text: Booked a king sized room with them for a night. The location is great, very central and the decor is really nice. The swimming pool and the gym is excellent, I did spend some time in the pool, jacuzzi and gym and enjoyed myself. The room is slightly soundproof so it’s not too noisy compared to other hotels. The downside is that the leather chair seems to have scratches on it, there seems to be stains on the floor, the water in the sink took a long time to drain and it’s next to a large building which means people in that building can see you in the room.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member

text: Ne yang kali ketiga saya stay dkt hotel ne n so far hotel ne tak mengecwa kn laa servis mantap bilik pun mantap harga berpatutan n recommend sgt hotel ne⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: everything is good
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Fo Po Chen
text: The hotel is VERY old and the studio king room given to us has spoilt cabinets and toilet flush. The overall room decor looks like something from the seventies. We have stayed in better 3-star hotels, hence we are confused why this is a “5-star” hotel. Checked out after 1 night (we booked 3) of uneasy sleep (mattress was BAD!) and headed to Grand Hyatt instead. Best decision made!
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: Had a great experience with this hotel. Apparently this is my 2nd time staying at this hotel.The lobby is not like any other modern hotels in KL, it’s a bit dated but in a nice way. The lobby is huge, very clean, smells good with a scent of frangipani. Room:Clean with dated furniture (not a problem), and a spacious bathroom. Shower, bathtub and toilet are separated and very clean. The water pressure is strong.Downside: the aircond was not cool enough, considering the current hot weather in Malaysia now.Breakfasts are delicious and a lot of varieties from Malaysian food to western. I truly enjoyed the breakfast and the attentiveness of staff to clear the used plates and the hospitality should be praised.Definitely going to stay at this hotel in the future.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 酒店古典有特色，舒适大气
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Sandrine Herdzikk
text: Petits déjeuners extraordinaire. Chambres spacieuses
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 虽然有点历史感但是房间打理都很干净，和一群好朋友一起过来这边参加活动，出行位置还算方便，建议去机场要早一点到，值机很慢。
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: Staff were okay friendliness Not the best for families but would be great for businesspeople
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 应该是老牌的五星级饭店，房间宽敞，大厅豪华，工作人员彬彬有礼；位置挺好，可以徒步到达石油双塔；有游泳池，早餐选择多；设施有点年头了，但打理的干净、整洁。
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: Very good location in downtown . Happy with my stay but toilet door need to be fixed

name: Stephen Chu
text: 位置在去所有景點丶打卡點丶食肆很就脚。補充一句，麻煩toilet paper 用啲厚先嘅紙，因為好容易穿！😅
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Hotel was strategically located near to Jetty Chew - a lot of amenities were available. Room was prepared excellently and service was great! Breakfast was sumptuous as well! Will definitely do a return visit here!
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Kenneth Wong
text: Good dining experience for ballroom function. The a lar carte options were tasteful.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Good service , very recommended
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Frank Pellicano
text: Good 4 star hotel.  Colonial external and entrance as most of old Goergetown.  Good breakfast each morning, mix of Asian and English cuisine.  Rooms are modern and comfortable.  Pool area is ok.  No alcohol served on premises while we stayed.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Quite a decent hotel with basic amenities. Pool was clean and less crowded. Consider getting the room with pool view as it’s nice. Only issue was the front desk lady with the specs did not greet welcome to us and even interrupted me halfway while I was telling her my request. Other than that, the rest of the staff were warm and friendly, the housekeeper guys did a great job at keeping the room clean and greeted us each time.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: excellent place and service. value for money. good breakfast session.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Vitamin K
text:
Stayed for business trip for 3 days. It is an old hotel but well maintained. Room is clean and spacious. Staff are friendly and the check in and out process are smooth, check in staff tried to accommodate my request patiently.

Love their breakfast with lot of varieties, mostly local food. Mains menu change everyday.

Located in the centre of Georgetown, easily accessible.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Tbh the cleanliness is so so. The location is easy to find but the lobby location is a bit tricky. I stayed for 2 nights, the breakfast is also average. BUT the pool is awesome!!!! Overall 3/5. Anyway, thank you Royale Chulan.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Clean hotel, various breakfast, also have a pool and 24-hour gym
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 服务质量还不错。酒店位置很好，离槟城关键的几个旅游点很近。房屋也有偏旧的问题，建议进行适当的翻修。值得考虑的酒店。旁边有个巴刹，吃饭很方便
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Had a nice stay the staffs are very friendly. However the room is a bit outdated and old, wish they’d upgrade the room
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: The hotel seems to expect every guest to check each item in the room against an internal list when checking in. At check-out, they claimed there should have been two towels in the room, but only one was found. This puts unnecessary pressure on guests, as we’re not responsible for checking every item in the room upon arrival. This approach made the experience quite uncomfortable.This version expresses your concern about the hotel's unreasonable expectations regarding room inventory.We recently stayed at this hotel, and while the overall experience was decent, the attitude of the front desk staff, madam Liang, was truly disappointing. His responses to our inquiries were very impolite and lacked the professionalism one would expect. As the first point of contact for guests, the front desk’s service attitude is crucial, but this experience left us feeling very dissatisfied. We hope the hotel can enhance staff training and improve service quality.”This clearly expresses your disappointment with the service while conveying your expectations for improvement.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 早餐很满意，选择很多，也很好吃。入住期间，刚好是小朋友生日，前台安排了小蛋糕，很感谢。
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Nice specious hotel with nice beeakfast, fast services and near
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: SAM Neow
text: 真的很烂！
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 这次给的房间正对泳池，view特别漂亮。因为就在市区，建议晚上出门去体验一下夜晚的吉隆坡，很不错一下。
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Mohd hasnol Abu hassan
text: A clean, comfortable place and near to the Twin Tower.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 早餐很好，打grab非常方便，马来西亚本土风格，下次还会来
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Saurav
text:
We stayed at this property for 2 nights.
Checkin - seamless and quick. Also, it allows early check-in with just 150 MYR.

Rooms - showed signs of aging, and there were spots and marks all over the place. The room lights also didn't work well.
Poorly equipped.
There was a bad smell all over the property. Also, the AC vents had something dripping out. Not sure why none of the staff noticed.

Breakfast - not too bad. The spread was diverse and reasonable.

Location - in middle of KLCC and Bukit Bintang, so perfect. Just don't expect the place to be walkable from any of these locations.

What deserves a special mention?
The location is great as you are just few minutes' drive from KLCC and Bukit Bintang.

What could be better?
Rooms need to be overhauled and the whole property needs deep cleaning.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 这家酒店应该是有年头了，但是胜在外观漂亮，位置就在Pavilion后面，性价比超高，房间装潢虽然老旧，但是品质还是可以的，房间大。服务也很贴心。
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 还可以酒店
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: n fr
text: I came to have dinner at Royale Chulan seremban in Asiatique Restaurant on October 12 with my husband. I would like to warn and remind your employee named Elly where he disrespected me as a guest. she has held my husband without shame and hugged my husband's arm in front of me. this shouldn't happen to your guest!!! he needs to be more professional when working!. he also had to respect me as a guest that came that night. this also symbolizes that a company does not provide proper guidance to employees as well as tarnishing the company's image. Incident report has been submit to your management. so I hope that your employee named Elly is given a warning or appropriate action so that he realizes what he is doing is inappropriate. at least it can teach a lesson to an employee named Elly or other employees not to make it a habit for guests or so that it does not happen to other guests as well because Royale Chulan is a well-known hotel and one of the most famous hotels in Malaysia.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 来马来西亚出差，总体来说还不错，偏向印度风格。离购物中心不算近也不算远，总体来说还算方便
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: Hotel, service and facilities are great! Also would be great if room carpets are upgraded/changed!
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: Last minute booking. OldHotel but still has character. Clean. Photo has no relation sorry
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: Good location,heart of KL
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Ismail Hassan
text: It is a nice place..
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: Lovess the swimming pool so much! 🥰
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: P b
text:
Initial look of the hotel foyer was beautiful. The breakfast Buffet had variety. Location was near the Pavillion mall.

Our stay was disappointing from the time we stepped out of the elevator to our room on the 2nd floor.  The decor was not maintained and dated. There were large patches of tiers in the carpet, patched unevenly could trip guests. Though the room was large, the carpet and furniture were stained and the towels were stained and torn. The room and washroom had a musty smell and felt unclean. The washroom glass metal dividers were rusted. We brought to the attention of the reception on the state of the room and the linens. Towel replacement was sent for the bath towels and none others. No other effort was made to make our stay pleasant.

The check-in to check-out was slow and unpleasant.  There are lots of customer service, but we didn’t  get a trained one andeven though we explained with the receipts we were over charged on our deposits for dining. Thankfully the person who dealt with us on the deposits stepped in and corrected, not yet confirmed by us.
At check-in (as always) our credit card was given for the deposit, but we were unable to charge any additional expenses to our room. We didn’t know we had to deposit additional money to be able to cover additional expenses to the room.  After we deposited the additional coverage on the second day, at the breakfast check out they stood us up and stopped the line-up, to call and check. We were embarrassed.
This review is mainly to get the hotel management to keep to the standard of a 5 star hotel as advertised on the website.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: Beautiful place, amazing lobby, people very friendly and easy approach,And walking distance to te pavilion shopping centre and to klccFood my God, brekkie and dinner  so so good , room a big size, definitely I will back to the royale chulan.teramakasi..God bless the people working there.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: Hotel was so closed to MRT and it is easy to access. Staf was friendly
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Lau Kien Choong
text: Worse check out process ever
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Cleanliness need to be improved further, the carpet smell is heavy & using too much perfume to cover it.Gym equipment need to be refurbished.No longer provide free parking.Breakfast until 10:30am which is good.Swimming pool using salt water is great.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Highly recommended! Staff dorg baik sangat! Tq. Lagi2x reception sabahan girl tu. Baik betul. Permudahkan urusan i. Sarapan banyak pilihan. Surely akan repeat. Thank you so much. I lupa nak catat nama that girl.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 每日房间名例行打扫， 就是凑合， 根本没有做到认真对待。 前台服务不错。 自助早餐虽然种类丰富， 但是肉类除了鸡肉， 没有别的。 虽然要尊重宗教信仰， 但至少要准备一些牛肉吧。
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Héctor BLCV
text: Hotel fantástico. El personal muy atento y amable, la habitación espaciosa y con todo lo necesario, baño amplio. Piscina genial y desayuno muy variado con opciones asiáticas y continentales. Último día nos íbamos pronto y nos dieron dos tupper vacíos para rellenarlos con comida del desayuno.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Nice staff, very clean, got parking with RM5 only for whole stay and their breakfast very nice. My regular hotel to check in if go to Penang
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Memang hotel fav bila ke penang. Semua okay sangat.. recommended 👍🏻
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Mer Mar
text:
Muy Buena elección para una visita a Georgetown!!
Habitaciones muy amplias, cómodas y con todos los servicios.
Desayuno muy amplio, con mucha variedad tanto de comida asiática como occidental y de calidad
Servicio muy amable y eficaz, en la recepción, restaurante, housekeeping...
Buena ubicación, al lado de la parte colonial y con buenas opciones de restauración cerca.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Syakirin Manap
text: Room is spacious. Pleasant staff. Breakfast spread was great. Value for money. Parking is plenty.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Bagus dan terbaik... boleh disyorkan pada kawan-kawan dan ahli keluarga serta saudara-saudara
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Irfan Hasan
text:
We stayed in 24th Sept 2024. The staffs were very helpful and friendly in assisting us to check in. We had 4 rooms, but only 1 of the rooms is ready but they tried their best to accommodate us.

Good location for exploring Georgetown. Nice breakfast spread. Rooms well kept.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Ivy Tan
text:
Was a Great Hotel to stay ! We booked a king size bed with a good deal and is worth it
The room and toilet was big , just that the towel was with stain only
Service was really good all given a good smile and service! Breakfast was not much selection but still good. The Gym was 24hr my partner was happy that the hotel has gym and can do so basic dumbbell workout. This hotel has Parking too, just that if too late went back there will be no space
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: So far the everything was just ok but the room very dirty
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Joseph Yew
text:
Enjoy the pool for two days, seeing the pool attendant with one hand not convenient, selva, is very hardworking in cleaning the floor using water gun in a hot weather for more than hours.

Praisinh and respect his work with smiley face and fast response.

I and my kids feel safe having him helping and monitoring the pool condition and water.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Rajender Prasad Meena
text:
I m enjoy Mly trip.
Hotal service is vary good
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: The room is huge for such an affordable price. The interior isn’t chic/pretty but definitely comfortable and spacious. There isn’t enough towels but they bring you some more once requested. They are also a little slow at cleaning your room but doesn’t matter if you’re out all day. The pool is very nice and also provides additional pool towels! The breakfast buffet is alright. Overall, a very pleasant stay and would totally recommend this hotel!
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Comfortable room. The location of the hotel which is relatively close to several main attractions also make it easier to move from one place to another.However, the cleanliness of the room should be given more attention.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Accept level but front desk manner should be improved
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Phan Hanh
text: The hotel is located in the center of Goergetown, surrounded by many restaurants and shops, but the first day when we checked in, there were only 2 bath towels and no face towels in the room. When we called the staff to request, they brought 2 small hand towels. The next day, when we noted down the housekeeping staff to add more face towels, they put the face towels in. The special thing is, during the 3 nights of staying here, there was a smell in the bathroom and toilet like armpit odor that lasted for 3 nights without disappearing, making me very uncomfortable. I thought this was very strange, I had never encountered it in any hotel I had ever stayed in. As for breakfast, there were only Halal dishes and traditional Malaysian dishes, so I couldn't eat anything.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: We booked two rooms and both rooms were clean and good. Beds and pillows were comfy too. The hotel is in walking distance to many attractions around Georgetown of which we like. Staff was okay but not friendly. The buffet breakfast was quite nice and included in the room rates.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Dr Matt
text: Dry hotel, almost everything is closed except the pool (unattended, no service), rooms (very good, are cleaned, nothing else) and breakfast (decent). Lounge, Spa and Bar all closed. Advertised a Bucket of Beer, staff looked horrified when I tried to order it!
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: ali aziziasl
text: This was our second time staying at this hotel. The atmosphere and history of the hotel in Georgetown are amazing, and the check-in process and services are very fast and efficient. Overall, I highly recommend staying at the Royal Hotel if you visit this area and make sure to explore and read about the stories of the old building.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: dpik cns1
text: stayed at your hotel recently for 2 nights from 8th Sept and check out on 10th Sept. room was clean, spacious and great location. had a wonderful stay until mar by the last night when i was prevented from parking my rented car on the ground floor by the Nepalese guard who demanded i park in the multi storey car park despite plenty of vacant lot on the ground floor. they have the cheek to say parking lot on ground floor is for big cars and since i was driving a Axia car not eligible to park on the ground floor. this was totally different when i was told during my check in parking on the ground floor was on first come first serve basis and its apparent the Nepalese guard make their own policy with respect to car lot on ground floor. fyi info i was willing to park my car near the ramp to the multi storey so not to tarnish hotel reputation. nevertheless i will definitely stay at this hotel for my upcoming trip to Pg since its value for money.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 酒店泳池很漂亮，是老牌酒店，房間稍微有點舊，但整潔，安靜，早餐很豐富。離景點很近，叫Grab很方便。😊👍👍👍
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 跟吉隆坡同名酒店价格类似，当时方方面面都差一个档次。
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Karthik
text: Clean and comfortable room with nice view..many restaurants and shops nearby the hotel
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Good location with food courts and basic shops nearby. Walking distance to photography street and chew jetty. Great experience.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Michele
text: Really the worst, def not a 4 star
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 非常好的一次体验，环境好服务好，进出大门都有侍者帮你拉门。本身是漂亮的古典历史建筑。每天下午两三点钟最热的时候我回宾馆，大厅里都提供免费畅饮的冰猕猴桃汁。单身住宿也提供2张门卡，每天赠送4套咖啡和红茶。
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Teo Jean
text: Air-cond leaking in the room, sent mechanics to check end up cannot do anything. Hotel did not purpose to change room for us also, as we stay for one night only so we also did not insist….the next morning waked, as the carpet is wet floor become slippery. Water coming out from the toilet side door although door is concealed, toilet no anti floor mate, walking within the toilet is hazardous ⚠️
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Kam Manap
text: Part of the hotel was under renovation. Therefore the stay was not "that" pleasant as expected.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Irwin Mohamad
text: I stayed here in early September 2024. I am really sorry for giving you only 2 stars. I really disappointed for the food breakfast. It was tasteless and unattractive to eat. Your hospitality also should and must be improved especially your staffs working at level 1 for breakfast time. They looks gloomy and i guess most of them looks like having big personal problem. No smile and greetings. This was really bad. Im just giving you honest review for you to improve. Hoping instant action will be made. Thanks.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Shamey. My
text:
I’ve stayed at other hotels in Penang, but I keep coming back to Royale Chulan, which has been my go-to since 2022. It’s truly my comfort hotel.

The staff, from reception to housekeeping and even the guards, are exceptionally friendly and attentive. I have no complaints at all.

The breakfast spread is wonderful, with the Nasi Lemak being a highlight. The service is quick and the staff are well-trained.

Thank you, Royale Chulan, for always providing such great hospitality.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Aris Tina
text: The best hotel n delicious breakfast 😋
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Sagaya Mary
text: We checked in one night at studio room as a family. This was during our CNY 2025. We were happy with with their hospitality, the staffs are friendly and helpful. The room is clean, neat and very comfortable. We also enjoyed Buffet breakfast, alot of choices. Overall, I would say "Syabas" keep it up 😂 we will surely come back again
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Trip.com Member
text: Checking in and out was smooth with friendly staff. Room was clean, air conditioning good, water pressure strong and bed was comfortable.It's strategically located at Curve which has many restaurants, cafes, shops and IKEA.

name: D.P P
text: Went for their so called buffet lunch and it was a disappointment. Save yourself the disappointment and avoid if you can. Referring to it as a 'buffet lunch' is misleading— food provided are extremely limited and for the price you pay, it feels like a complete rip-off.

name: Trip.com Member
text: Good value for money. Had smoking smell, the room is not clean and tv can’t use.

The only thing is interior wise tv room feels like living in the 90s. But overall is nice hotel to stay in for short vacay in town.

name: Muhammed Faruqui

name: Norliwati Mohd Yusof
text: Makanan sedap-sedap belaka
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member

text: beautiful old building design classic n nice delicious cafe friendly people n easy access to town Kuala Lumpur.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: The room is very spacious. High ceiling, aircond very cold even though set temperature for 27 degree. Very comfortable and cosy. Things to improve: 1. Inadequate kitchen utilities in example no bowl / plate /spoon / fork provided.2. Need to change television to at least android / smart tv.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Pick Leng Yeon
text: Great location with walking distance to Bukit Bintang and KLCC. Good service from the staff at front desk and the receptionist at the cafe. However, the dining experience is not so good with the poor staff attitude (cook at egg station) and limited food choices. Higher expectation for a 5 star hotel.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Dr Suffian
text:
Had an weekend getaway with family after hectic months. Decided to stay here for the first time with family for 2 nights. Upon check-in, i was upgraded to bigger room which i thankful for it. Room 301. I was told by the receptionist that its located at the other wing, so better walk across the hall and take the opposite lift since its closer and we did. Upon arriving at Level 3, we are dumbstruck since there is no room 301. Manage to walk throughout the floor and only to realize that 301 located RIGHT ON TOP of the reception wing. Ok that was not a good start. Probably the receptionist just newly started, wont let that ruined my precious weekend. Upon arrived at the room, deco was like 10 years ago, but i believe blended quite well with the overall hotel theme. Regardless, upgrade your TV for the suite rather than using the 32" LCD screen which is not usable since everything hang. God. At night, we just realized that the toilet pump is leaking. Water keep on overflowing into the toilet bowl, creating a distrubing night. Since its already a midnight and kids already settling in, i decided to call up the hotel team tomorrow morning instead. Next morning, my wife called once - no action. I returned back to the room on the afternnon seeing the water still overflowing - called for the 2nd time and i want them to make sure its fixed before we came back from a dinner. Surely enough, no more water overflowing but now there is no water at all to flush the toilet. From bad, it turns into worst. Now we cant take a dump in our upgraded room. I had enough, wont call again and just go ahead and just gonna checkout instead. With the pricepoint, there is vast option outside to consider. Extremely bad experience and will never recommended to anyone to stay here.

Checked in - 18 Oct 2024
Checked out - 20 Oct 2024
Room 301
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: klinikdrsilan sg.lalang
text:
Pros
Room was spacious, english style, well maintained and clean
Breakfast was fairly good
Staff was friendly

Only downside is they did not replace the toiletries on daily basis , we have to call on demand
No robe

name: Trip.com Member
text: 酒店位置不错，卫生真的一言难尽，第一晚入住已经半夜，是四楼的房间正对着两个机器一直轰轰轰的响，第二天找携程客服说明，马上说安排给我换房间，换到二楼的房间看起来比原先那间好一点，第二天早上才发现窗户口是鸽子窝，早上格子咕咕咕叫不停，酒店前台态度傲慢。换房间折腾了一下数据线又丢了，不想在折腾，还是留着时间去玩。这个酒店真的谨慎选择吧，携程服务是不错的，协调也是比较快

name: Trip.com Member
text: Fancy spending New Year Eve or special occasion or just a staycation? Then Royale Chulan the Curve will be the place. Surrounded by shopping malls, celebrations went on through midnight. The fireworks display was a scene to behold. After a leisure New Year day breakfast, just hop over to the malls or relax. Will definitely book again. However, I experienced an over zealous housekeeping staff who asked me twice if I were checking out (when I went for breakfast and shopping). It was quite creepy when people could observe guests going in and out. Gave my feedback regarding this matter to the reception / checkout counter.
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Normahaini Mohd Nor
text: A lot of shopping complex near by.  Love

name: Trip.com Member
