title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Nurul Fathirah
text:
our 4 days 3 nights stay here weren’t that great. we booked studio, but been told that the room is the lowest specs due to the sizes and etc and they offered us upgraded to deluxe. as I need to cook for my son during the day we stick to our initial booking.

you know what the most unpleasant experience? the staff at the entrance after he loaded out our luggage, he just left our stuffs at the front door, and no one attended me that time. MY HAND IS FULL, I nee to carry my bags, my son running here and there, can you imagine? you have to carry the bag also at the same time to hold your son ALONE. I can sense they only help people with high standard looking with expensive cars. also one lady at the cafe during breakfast (really not friendly, making a weird face when i asked her for kids friendly cutlery.)

2. now the ROOM. ( dirty filthy carpets, no hand towels, one bath matt only, )what on earth you booked studio room with kitchen BUT THEY DIDNT PROVIDE YOU THE DISH SOAP? NO BOWL NO PLATES NO FORK SPOON ETC NO COOKING UTENSILS, until u asked them. okay they gave us bowl pot n pans. can you imagine we only have ONE FREAKING SMALL SPOON. for our 4 days stay? how to eat? and how to drink? and the worse part! YOU PAID FOR THE ROOM BUT THE MICROWAVE ISNOT WORKING.

3. oh ya dont forget about the two telephones provided in the rooms. BOTH CANNOT BE USED. but guess what? during our last day, wow, i was so suprised, we receive a call from front desk (it was 12.30pm) i guess that’s a call to remind us to get off from the room asap. oh wow? does the phone is working ? i cant even use your phone for 4 days for emergency / housekeeping, I EVEN HAD TO CALL THE HOTEL USING MY OWN PHONE, and also they didn’t take any actions even i said the phone cannot be use, but you have the audacity to call your guests to fasten up the checking out process?

4. most of your staffs are not friendly(dining hall) except the front desk for checking in/out. ive been to perdana hotel, split second they help you to bring the bag, they even open the car door for you, the smiles and everything. same goes to four seasons, their services top notch.

5. oh ya breakfast? naah. western food very bland minimal option, , sambal nasi lemak, still got the flakes, nasi lemak very nice, but the good thing was, their croissants, when they’re still hot, very delicious. otherwise, most of the staff at the cafe were not very friendly, not even a smile or a good gesture to welcome us. i dont know, because ive been to few hotels such as : pavilion hotel, majestic, sofitel damansara, Four Seasons hotel, perdana hotel, i have never experienced any unpleasant/unfriendly staff. so yeah. but front desk staff, very friendly and professional

NEVER EVER REPEAT THIS HOTEL.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: John Tan
text: Good hotel for business or pleasure.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member

Love ❤️ the spacious room, cleanliness & setting. Great housekeeping team! Wish front office could cope up with the quality of the housekeeping 😄
Checking in process too slow 😅
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Shin Yee Foong
text: Great value at the heart of Kuala Lumpur. The room is a little bit of run down but it's spacious and clean. Walkable distance to Pavillion,  or you could take MRT from Conlay Station that is just opposite the hotel to other places in KL. We left our phone charger in the room and called up to the hotel, their service is superb, the charger was identified very quick and they even offered to courier the lost item to you (charges under us).
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: 親父
text:
大きくてリゾート感のある外観で、皆さんご親切！気分よくフロントに入れました。お部屋は広く天井も高く、景色も良く。レストランのお食事も美味しい！
ですが…五つ星と思うと…。
その理由は、シーツが穴あき、シミあり。タオルも使い古しすぎて白が変色している。縁はほどけているような代物。それに出血染みまであり！これには引きました。枕も洗っているの！？と疑うようなおじさん臭…。2泊目に換えてくれないタオルを枕に敷いて寝ました。臭いので。
セキュリティBOXも壊れて使えなかった。
洗面は詰まっていて水がスムーズに流れない…。洗面台に汚水が溜まってしまい…。
2泊しましたが、2泊目のタオルも換えてくれず…。一泊目のがそのまま置いてありました。
しかも隣部屋と今は閉鎖されている扉で繋がっていたような部屋の作りになっており、隣の会話が筒抜け。3m先にお隣さんがいるのを感じながらの睡眠。うるさくて眠れずイヤホンをして眠る…
2泊で約19000円。コスパいいと思います。
それでマレーシアの三流ゴージャス気分を味わいたいなら良いと思います！
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: Close to Pavillion mall with walkable distance, Conlay MRT station. It's also just about 1km away from TRX mall.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: A,房间比较老旧。B,早餐比较丰盛。C,服务大多数比较好，除了*************,这两人的服务质量很差，而且****，我们只是家人游完泳以后洗澡需要新的干净的浴巾,我去前台。和他们沟通要三个浴巾，结果前台这两人告知我只能给两个，我说我们三个人需要三个,这俩人就是不给，显然是故意的行为，*****脸上挂着邪恶的笑容，他们的行为*******镶嵌在在他们皇家两字上面。
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 酒店位置很好，周围吃饭很方便，步行去壁画街也很方便！门口还有很大的停车场！

name: Seaman Mogul
text:
For a heritage place like Penang, it shows how guests should be treated.
All in all, this place brings the royal in you when you're not one.

A feather in the hat, a gem hidden in the Pearl of the Orient.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 性价比高，有露天泳池，健身房。地理位置也挺方便。
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Muhammad Akmal
text: Great location in the corner of the city. Lots of nearby attractions. Room is not bad, breakfast also ok-ish. But the price is cheap for a royal chulan so worth it to stay. Booked last minute here and didn’t get dissapointed.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: MG
text: No nos han hecho la habitación, el secador no seca y la alfombra del piso huele. Es céntrico y la piscina bien para niños
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Siti Nabilah Othman
text:
What a pleasant experience! There was a bit of hiccup initially but the staffs handled it well.

We book a studio for 2 for one night stay. Upon checking in, we were told that we had to wait like 10minutes as the room was not ready yet. After 10-15minutes the receptionist informed us that we got our room upgraded to Executive Suit.

It was a really really good room. Massive ones with high ceiling, big bath tub separated from the shower and a lovely terrace.

The complementary breakfast was good too. (although I was actually in town for a big examination so I couldn’t really enjoy). But will definitely happy to be back!

Oh we checked the Executive Suite rate and we actually saved near RM300 per night which was a bonus!
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Wonderful hotel, excellent service and perfectly located for exploring Georgetown. Stayed for just one night but the rooms were spacious and clean, good selection for breakfast and staff very welcoming. Very nicely located for Fort Cornwallis, the promenade and walking distances to the main historical and cultural sites of Georgetown. Would recommend
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Tiger Cheah
text:
Imagine Cold Miso soup
Fork and spoon place at places you don't know
What a pity, owners did use all good ingredients but yet you get mediocre food.
Best is there is definitely a lot of staff around.

With all this resources it should be a 5 star hotel......
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 不错，服务也好
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Muz Hamid
text:
Stayed in the Studio Room unit.

Pros:
+Very convenient location, in Weld Quay, Georgetown. Surrounded by many amenities.
+Deco is dated but colonial architecture is beautiful.
+Got the corner Studio Room unit. Amazingly spacious. Very high ceiling. Studio units are all situated at the top floor called Attic.
+Very long corridor leading to the corner unit. Reminiscent of the scene from the movie The Shining.
+Comes with outdoor veranda, nice place to chill. Ocean view.
+Water pressure for the bathroom shower is good and strong. Heater temperature is consistently hot.
+Room came with complimentary coffee machine.
+Large smart Android TV (Sharp brand). Able to stream YouTube, Netflix and Amazon Prime TV.
+Very comfortable and huge king size bed. Didn't measure but feels like a Californian King.
+International electrical plug.
+Amazing breakfast, wide variety of dishes. Had 3 live cooking stations serving egg, noodle soup and roti chanai.

Con:
- Aircon unit was audibly noisy.
- WiFi speed of 5 Mbps. Very slow in 2024.
- TV streaming through phone is annoying as all the TV names are similar/same, i.e. model number of TV. TV should been renamed based on room number. Ended up playing streaming tennis match with adjoining room who was also streaming from the phone.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Ajax Fabuloso
text:
Please provide free parking for your hotel guests!
Not worth every cent spent on parking fees here.
Also,check your toilet bidet hose,it leaks and is very difficult to use.
Hats off to the receptionist & porter for their attitude and helpfulness.
That’s it for my honest review.
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Trip.com Member
text: Location: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐Royale Chulan The Curve is strategically located in Mutiara Damansara, Petaling Jaya, making it incredibly convenient for both business and leisure travelers. The hotel is within walking distance to The Curve shopping mall, KidZania Kuala Lumpur, and several dining options. The proximity to public transportation, including the nearby train station, adds to its appeal.Food: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐The hotel offers a delightful dining experience with its variety of restaurants and cafes. Guests can enjoy a wide range of cuisines, from local Malaysian dishes to international favorites2. The breakfast spread is particularly noteworthy, with a good selection of both local and Western options. The on-site restaurants provide a cozy atmosphere, perfect for a relaxing meal after a long day.Service: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐The service at Royale Chulan The Curve is exceptional. The staff are attentive, friendly, and always ready to assist with any requests. Check-in and check-out processes are smooth, and the housekeeping team ensures that rooms are clean and well-maintained. The hotel's amenities, including high-speed internet and a business center, cater well to both leisure and business travelers.Overall, Royale Chulan The Curve offers a fantastic stay with its great location, delicious food, and top-notch service. Whether you're visiting for business or leisure, this hotel provides a comfortable and enjoyable experience.
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Trip.com Member
text: Our favourite hotel for family trip in KL. One of the few that offers great price for a two bedroom hotel and breakfast for whole family.
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Noorul khatimah
text: Comfortable and valuable
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Trip.com Member
text: It’s my 3rd stay in Royale Chulan each time I am in KL,chose to book at Family suite room as we have 4 adults in this group.Check in to the hotel was a breeze and thought of getting nice facilities for a family excites me.To my horror,the ironing board cover was very dirty and if was detached from the board,When we opened the cupboard,it gave a creeking sound.Not enough of hangers inside the closet for us to hang our clothings too.The door between the master bedroom ( with a king size bed) and toilet was unable to close as we left the toilet light on when we are asleep.We had 4 days of breakfast in the hotel and the food variety was almost the same and most of the food/fruits/yoghurt are slow to top up or practically NO REFILL AT ALL,Most of the cooked dishes are cold by the time we arrive ,say at around 8am.Very disappointing ! May not book this hotel in the near future
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Deelicious Food
text:
We are from JB celebrating our Christmas at Royal Chulan The Curve. As we check-in and my kids so excited to see Santa Cruz. The kids loved it and want to say Thank you to Santa for placing the Christmas socks goodies .Very convenient for shopping and lots of activities at curve, enjoyed the snowing at the western court, and delightful meal at Royale.

Our 2 night stay at Royal Chulan The Curve was very meaningful. Bravo to the team and management.

Diana and family, from Johor Bahru
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Shafiah Alamgir
text: Suka pi sini sebab Ade family room...Tapi skang quality dah dropped, check in smoothly, tapi supplies dlm bilik Tak cukup, aku ambik family room tuk 4 pax, supplies Ade yg tuk 2 pax, Ade yg xdpt, Telefon dlm bilik tu takde function, bilik pon outdated, sama je after 15 tahun...aku ni slalu dtg sini setiap 2 tahun
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Trip.com Member
text: I did got bitten by bed bugs the first two nights before i made my complaint. It was resolved immediately so I am thankful. My advice though, this should not have happened. Please do regular servicing on the mattresses. Travelers are very busy and these types of inconvenience is affecting us. We barely have time to complaint and bed bugs are serious matters especially to those who are more sensitive and I had to seek treatment for it. Other room for improvement would be the breakfast buffet. It was the same for the whole 4 days of stay. Please introduce more varieties to your menu and not just have the same for few days straight.Otherwise the
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Trip.com Member
text: I stayed one night at Royal Chulan with my friends & we took the family suite. The rooms were very comfortable & spacious and so is the bathroom. Breakfast spread was good & delicious.
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Ahmad Puzi
text: tempat senang cari, tepi jalan besar, ada walk way yg menyambungkan dng d' curve, ikea dll. bilik yg memuaskan bersih dan kemas
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Trip.com Member
text: I used to stay here, but during the last two days, I stayed nearby where renovation work started at 10:30 PM and went on until 1 AM. It was very noisy, and I couldn’t sleep well. The night shift reception staff mentioned that the work would continue for a few hours, which I believe the hotel should manage better. The morning reception staff tried to inform the relevant department to monitor this issue, but it seems they were unable to resolve it during my second day of stay.”
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Kumaran Rajendran
text: First of all the staff is not friendly or helpful. Check in supposedly 3pm but told to wait til 3.30pm to check in since room not ready and when inquired further, staff was rude and even told me to wait bluntly. When I refused and stood firm, they quickly released the room to me at 3.10pm. Don't understand what's went on. Facilities are minimum, pool was ok but ppl were working near pool while we use it so felt uneasy. Price of room was rm500+ but parking is not free for such a luxurious stay. Why no complimentary rate? Room was not worth the price, heater kept malfunctioning and TV completely didn't work. Breakfast was OK but not worth the price. Room view also horrible despite put in special request. Totally no requests were entertained as though i stay for free. Regret my stay and definitely will not book again. Few other customers were seen complaining the same to hotel while check out. Stay at your own risk. And don't say u were never warned. Royale Chulan is not royal after all..pls change the name to something that suits your lousy service level. Tq.
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Vainavee Vainu
text: Went there to have Christmas buffet lunch. The food was okay. The service was so bad and staff is super slow. They took so long to refill the buffet dishes. So many people were waiting to get food.
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Trip.com Member
text: Saya suka hotel ni, bersih dan dekat shopping complex, akan repeat bersama family
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Trip.com Member
text: 房间不大，但干净整洁，躺在床上就能欣赏日出🌄，意外的惊喜。卫生间干湿分离，方便沐浴洗衣。早餐尤其好，品种多口味佳。前台服务热情，因转换器遗留在沙巴酒店，故向前台借了个转换器，免费使用。酒店出行方便，就在乔治城艺术街附近，步行即达，周边餐饮小吃特别多。总之性价比很高，推荐入住。
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 空调太吵，睡眠质量差等人，不建议，。
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Dr. Muruga
text: Good heritage hotel and well priced and right smack in Georgetown … anyone and everyone should try it. Esp if u have a tight budget
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Nice facilities, location and food very good
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Diana Ha
text: Goede locatie, vriendelijk personeel alleen zijn de kamers iets verouderd. Zwembad was ook prima!
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Ceri P
text: We booked a triple room, but upon arrival at the hotel, we were told that no triple room had been reserved for us. Instead, we were given a suite with a king bed, and a single bed was brought in separately. To make matters worse, the ceiling leaked in the middle of the night. After taking a shower at 11pm, I found the hairdryer was out of work. I asked the front desk to send a new one, but they didn't deliver it even after twenty minutes, so I just went to sleep. The experience was very poor, and it's hard to believe this is a four-star hotel. The only good thing is that the front desk service attitude was okay.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Nicholas How
text:
The highlight of my stay is the friendliness of your employee Selva who was taking care of the pool and gym. He is friendly, attentive and ensured that my experience in the pool and gym was 5 star.

Room is spacious and the beds are heaven.

Very near to all the eateries and i cannot recommend this place enough
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Katy Potts
text:
Well located original Heritage hotel, for a real George Town experience & great service and facilities at really good value - we had 2 rooms for family of 4 - 2 teens & came in best rate when we were searching, for quality midrange  hotel with pool & gym in George Town. Room was lovely with views of sea and breakfast was excellent.
All staff were very professional and hard working.  Inc. front desk and really kind doorman from Nepal and taxi driver linked to hotel.
Thank you
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 地理位置有优势，对比附近的其他几家同类型南洋风酒店，这家性价比是OK的。但设施真的也就那样。房间卫生间洗手盆是坏的，床品明显很陈旧，确实没办法和那些国际连锁四星比。尤其是下午三点还拿不到房卡，前台印度服务员也很无奈。 我只能说花这钱住这里不算踩坑，但也没多大惊喜。朋友如果来槟城，我是不推荐这家。尤其对比第二天入住的长荣桂冠，简直好太多，12点中午去到就办理了入住，没对比就没伤害，瞬间觉得自己好笨，为啥不两晚都预定ever green。 总之，我觉得我点评算客观。早餐也是一般，马来酒店普遍酒店早餐都很卷，他们家除了就餐环境还比较舒适，味道和食物也没什么太惊喜。 奉劝大家，不要每天吃他们的椰浆饭，我发现这些印度马来食物一大锅，你是吃不出是否味道变质，因为香料和里面的酸性食物盖住了食材本身的新鲜度。所以我建议国人偶尔品尝一下可以，天天吃绝对受不了。
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 酒店位置很好，去哪里都方便、早餐很好吃、酒店卫生：很好服务：也很好态度超级好设施：也有很多工作人员也是随叫随到，有问题他们也会很快解决和处理问题。
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 位置好，离码头很近，设施有点老旧，房间很大，楼下有个排挡，可是下午4点就收摊了，乱七八糟税收的很多，很讨厌
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Breakfast good / room toilet water  drain slow… wet wet
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Strategic location to stay at Georgetown
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 还可以，比较干净，位置差了一点，出去玩吃饭，不太方便
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Martina Spina
text: Ottima posizione, camere molto ampie (e non è scontato in malesia), colazione buonissima. Senza dubbio il miglior rapporto qualità/ prezzo tra tutti gli hotel che ho girato per la Malesia
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 很不错的酒店
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 我订的家庭套房、很宽敞很干净。酒店的早餐一级棒、很多游客都花钱来吃。工作人员服务态度很好。有事情积极处理。赶上国王登基没有订到KL火车票、前台小姐姐积极帮我订票、点赞。有一个印度女经理会说中文、告诉我哪里榴莲本地最好吃～很Nice～体验感超值。
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Will coming back to stay next season, thank you .
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Akmar Ninie Nasiruddin
text: Been there for ceremony food, not hotel standards. Need to improve the food presentation and taste.
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: ruuma media
text: Very very bad experience with this hotel. Better find another hotel rather than staying here!
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Julian Song
text:
Old but gold classic.

Room is clean and well keep.
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Trip.com Member
text: Day 1 - only 1 towel available, stains on bedsheet, no phones on bedside, air conditioning noises so loud we had to move to another room at 11pm.  Day 2 - broken safe, phone out of order, stains on bedsheets, counter top in toilet moulded, toilet lights black out twice!!!The only good thing about this hotel is the location, nothing else!  Worst experience I’d ever had!
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Mohd syarif Mohd azmi loo
text:
INCREDIBLE ONE NIGHT STAY!

I had a wonderful stayed yesterday after purchasing their Merdeka Deal promo on 31st August 2024 which is Rm106.70net (room only), and it exceeded my expectations! The booking process was smooth as you just have to walk-in to the property to get this and the deal offered incredible value for money.

The room was clean, comfortable, and well-equipped with all the amenities I needed for a relaxing stay. The staff were exceptionally friendly and attentive, making me feel welcome from the moment I arrived.

The location of the hotel was also a big plus with 5 steps to The Curve mall and 15 steps to the IPC/Ikea. My stay was incredibly convenient especially with the Train station located just nearby. It made getting around the city so easy and hassle-free.

Overall, I highly recommended this hotel for anyone looking for a great deal without compromising quality and service. I’ll definitely be back!!
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Trip.com Member
text: Parking no longer free. No room phone to call to front desk during my stay.
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: wan zulh
text: breakfast kat sini okay.walaupun mknn x bnyk tp mknn sedap
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Trip.com Member
text: Nice hotel. Near to shopping malls
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: KL Loh
text: spacious meeting room at 11 floor
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Trip.com Member
text: Hotel abit old, good location with nearby shopping mall, friendly staff
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Trip.com Member
text: Nice room & hotel. Surrounded by lots of shops. Several times staying here
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Trip.com Member
text: 房间干净整洁，枕头和床垫都不错，很舒服，早餐是印度风味多一些，自制酸奶不错，对面商场逛街方便，也靠近万达
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Trip.com Member
text: The staff is friendly and the room is spacious. Have been staying in this hotel for multiple times due to the good location. Just that the parking is no longer free anymore.
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Trip.com Member
text: MEMUASKAN
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Trip.com Member
text: First impression, sampai jer lobi, wangi yakmat. Pastu receptionist sampai ke bellboy, semuanya sangat2 terbaik diorang punya service. Bilik tak luas sangat tapi puas hati dari luar pintu sampai dalam bilik. Yg penting ada balkoni boleh layan view menghadap tren. Walking distance to The Curve, Ikea, dan IPC. Breakfast not so many choices tapi semuanya sedap especially nasi goreng dia ada rasa wok tu. Proses check in dan check out sangat mudah tanpa deposit. Will repeat soon.
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Ahmad Hazwan
text: Paid parking is a bit off to me. No privileges to the hotel customer. During the day,  the parking was barricaded with no guard attending to make sure that the customer can pass thru to the parking. The rest is okay
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: hidayah's definition
text: i had an event at the curve and decided to bring my family along to stay. hotel is not new, but is clean and have a classic style. location is close to 3 malls. staff were all great. breakfast variety is not large but good for the price rm40 per adult in the weekend. parking is separate from mall but no complimentary rate. abt rm9 per night stay, which is alright. happy w our stay.
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Trip.com Member
text: The family suite room is very big and accommodate all 4 of us. Kidzania and Ikea is nearby. And also got 2 malls nearby. We enjoyed our stay here~
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Trip.com Member
text: Most of it was good but the particular room I was in wasn't "Clean" as I was there for 3 nights and every night I'm woken up at 3.30-4am  and after that I hear strange noises upstairs like someones doing gymnastics and I can smell of CutiCura powder though I don't use any powder so the smell was rather worrying started listening to some religious tunes and slept with the songs in the background.
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Trip.com Member
text: We stayed for 4 nights and then we decided to extend our stay for another night. You can read my previous comment about the hotel.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Shantian Kaoru
text:
9月に３泊しました。
古い感じはしますが、清掃は行き届いており過ごしやすかった。私が使いたいアメニティも揃っており、リネン系も臭くなく、硬くもなく、問題なかった。
ベットのスプリングもワタシ的には丁度良くグッスリ眠れました。
ソファの部屋、ベッドルーム、それぞれにテレビがあり、広すぎて私一人では使いこなせないと言うのが正直なところ。
また近くにショッピングモールもあります。
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: This is really 5 star hotel!I was really amazed by friendly staff, large room, service and breakfast, so luxury hotel near pavilion by walking just 5 min!for petronas twin tower you should take taxi 10min!I’m really satisfied!
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: perkhidmatan cukup baik dengan adanya parking berbumbung dan selamat
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 我是單人出差的女性商務客，停留1天，飯店竟然安排一個有section door在房內的房間，重點是房內的聯通門還沒有鎖（連鎖頭都沒有）以至於我剛剛入住就發現房內食物味道很濃郁，尋著臭味打開門看到一個陌生男人在床上吃東西。換房後1202房間很髒，馬桶泛黃，天花板有蜘蛛網和蜘蛛在爬，浴缸的水一直是淤泥般的髒水，反應了數次都沒有改善，我想這就是我吃了飯店早餐連續拉肚子五天的原因。服務生對於我的「改善詢問」，很不耐煩，但是我客氣且禮貌，並且為了讓飯店能維修水管，我騰出許多時間讓他們作業，卻沒有人來維修過。當我反應不想和另一個陌生男子共用一個房間時，櫃檯人員竟然認為我是小題大作，因為他們認為811號房無法從房內將聯通門上鎖，他們要求隔壁房鎖上即可（這是單向鎖的聯通門），但我是一位女性住客，隔壁是男性⋯非常奇怪的一間五星級飯店。未來我的出差絕對不選擇這個集團旗下飯店入住
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 第一次來到馬來西亞開會的會場,被外觀貌似宮廷的酒店給嚇到,酒店裡面可是現代的裝潢,跟外觀比起來真的大不同,這次主要是來參加會議的,中午有提供自助餐,餐點雖然簡單,但相當豐富,味道也算適中,內部的裝潢設計簡單,乾淨整齊,現在的工作人員都隨時在整理環境,對一個五星級酒店來講算有在水準之上了,酒店應該算是在市中心,離百貨商場,主要的景點都不算太遠,唯獨對於周邊的交通環境算是領教到了,這跟酒店無關,順帶一提,若是有機會前來馬來西亞觀光旅遊,這家倒是可以參考看看.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: MAKAN SEDAP DAN LOKASI YANG STATEGI
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: Nice buffet. Room have to upgrade better because room quite old fashioned
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 太赞了！早餐丰盛吃到撑，地理位置好，离市内很多景点都不远，离地铁站和商场都很近，出入很方便，房间超大，舒适度很好！
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 性价比高，感觉是老牌豪华酒店，有年代感，但是整体这个价位还是很不错的，早餐也很丰富
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 性价比非常高的酒店
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 性价比非常高的酒店
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: memuaskan
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Jastin Matasan
text: Terbaik
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Bill Wang
text:
客人出入的位置在奇怪的小巷子內。
豪華特大房真的不錯，有陽台，廁所與淋浴間是分開的。房間可以看泳池。泳池很好游。
早餐很好。
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: yahya
text: Overall, I was really satisfied with the service given by the hotel management and staffs. The concierge staffs , Najihah and Mr Joel were cordial and helpful to ensure that our check-in process smooth and quick . They prepared for us a welcome drink; it allowed us to quench our thirst since it was really hot in the noon. They had an array of breakfeast buffet selections, both local and international cuisine. From the looks of it, it seems that the hotel is quite old, however they maintained the hotel room really well. The toilet facilities in the hotel room weee great .The hotel is 8 minutes walk to the Padang Kota Lama foodcourt, and approximately 15 minutes to Little India and Jalan Kapitan Keling mosque , which makes it quite easy for the in-house guests to walk around the George Town city. On top of that, their surau and restrooms were kept clean always.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 讲真，下次来还会住这里，知道我们6点出门赶飞机，提早5.30准备好早餐打包. 非常棒
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 10/10 will come again! Clean and friendly staff, you most definitely feel welcome!
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Perfect! The breakfast is good! The service is good too!
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 我们入住比较晚，进房间后就发现房间水龙头有问题一直往外溅水，和前台沟通，因为太晚了没有马上换房。第二天一早又去找酒店的人，说是会派人来房间维修，如果修不好给我们换房。等了很久维修的人才来，看了一下说修不好，过一会儿再回来修，结果等了一天都没有来，整个台面还有地上都在渗水，很恶心，整体体验很差
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Location is strategic if you reach George Town by ferry. Converted from a iconic old building. Breakfast is good.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 非常满意很好
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 酒店整体很好，旁边就是公交总站和码头。早餐很不错，工作人员很热情，保安也很不错。酒店性价比很高。
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Penn Vo
text:
Great hotel at a great price.

The staff was amazing and quick with every need that we had.

Immediately upon opening arriving there is someone to open the door for you and the front desk is very attentive and friendly to work with. The check in process was easy and quick.

The rooms themselves are beautiful. Spacious room, with a large king sized bed and large bathroom. Constantly kept clean. My only gripes were that the pressure from the rain shower was weak and that they had no spare adaptors for chargers.

For us, we had free breakfast which tasted delicious with a variety of local and western options. Definitely worth the quick bite before heading out to explore Penang.

From towels to blankets, the housekeeping staff was quick to get us everything. No complaints whatsoever.

Definitely recommend.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Muhammad Hafiz Rosli
text: Highly recommended all time🌹🌹🌹
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: バスタオルだけはありますがフェースタオル、ハンドタオルは無いのは残念。アメニティも今ひとつ。エアコンの音が大きく気になりました。コスパ的には朝食は良かったです。
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 泳池在中庭，很漂亮，提供早餐。
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Menarik
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: Room was ok I need of refurbishment overall ok service breakfast spread was better than other royal chulan establishments for the price ok I guess. Parking wad a little hard to access but ample.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: 非常好，在马来西亚住过最舒服的酒店
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Amina Abdel Hamid
text:
I had mold in my rice. My rice! Absolutely unbelievable. Any hotel of any rating should be able to serve fresh rice as it is not a difficult nor expensive dish to make. But I was given moldy rice at this establishment and of course freaked out as rice mold can give you terrible gastrointestinal maladies and ruin your whole vacation.

I first gave the earthy taste of the rice the benefit of doubt since they garnished this dish with flowers (see pictures) and I may have nibbled on some. But after closer scrutinization and smelling it, I realized that the earthy smell and blue black/yellow clumping of rice is actually mold. The meat didn’t smell freshly cooked either. The problem was I already ate half the dish before realizing it.

My husband promptly informed the staff of this issue explaining how this could potentially ruin our holidays inquiring how the hotel will make up for it, in case I do end up ill because of their food. How they handled our concern was unprofessional at best.

The cook was defensive, claiming the black dots were dill and not mold. The receptionist claimed it‘s not her responsibility but later retracted her claim taking accountability. When we suggested they take me to hospital if I get sick free of charge, they suggested I go immediately, because „a driver is available now but not later“.

For context, I travelled all day to get there and was exhausted. Ordered room service at around 9:30pm and ate that moldy dish, had to vomit afterwards. Around 11pm they wanted to take me to the hospital because it‘s convenient for them, but I needed my sleep. My husband had to convince them to help me organize transport IF I got sicker during the night, but they insisted I go immediately as „no driver will be available later“.

Long story short, they agreed to our proposal, but not without a discussion. The next day when we addressed the issue at the reception they didn‘t even want to reimburse us for the moldy meal telling us it‘s not their department. After my husband contacted the head manager we finally got an apology and a promise of reimbursement for the meal. We ended up not profiting of our paid breakfast to avoid eating anything spoiled. What a bad experience it all was!

As a guest I expect a hotel to cater to my needs and value my health especially if they potentially poisoned me with moldy food, without any discussion. Any respectable hotel will offer reimbursement for the spoiled meal and compensation without any hesitation!

The fact the food hygiene standard is so low, and the staff didn’t take accountability for the mistake immediately is what made me give a 1* review.

The hotel itself has a charming vintage vibe but without a good service, a hotel doesn‘t do its stars justice.
title: Royale Chulan Penang

name: Trip.com Member
text: It was an awesome stay. The guy in the reception didn’t only stored our luggage’s when we arrived earlier than check in time but even allowed us to checked in right then and there. After a gruelling 10 hr bus trip (with delay) from Melaka, he sure was the light after hell 😂 Everyone was helpful, sometimes there might be a language barrier but they will still try to talk and not left you hanging! Rosalyn from the Restaurant was also helpful and informative giving us recommendation and tips!  Nothing but good things to say. Maybe just more attention to small details in the cleanliness of the rooms , like molds in the nooks and crannies of the bathroom area, bed fabric sliding off  etc. but nothing extreme to affect your stay.The hotel is convenient to walk around to. Just a stone throw there’s a local eatery  if you want to try  local food right away.

It should be called The Plebeian Chulan rather than Royale Chulan, dirty bathroom with mould and wall fixture that looks like it belongs to some ghetto housing. Bed headboard was old and dirty. Peeling wallpaper with dust.

Don’t know which genius think the wardrobe and bed side table arrangement was good which makes it hard to access.

I’ve stayed at other Royale Chulan before but this takes the cake as the lousiest one. Even a motel room on top a shops-houses had better cleanliness than this. At least for the motel I know I’m paying a quater of the price and didn’t expect anything more.

Imagine paying RM200++ for such a low quality room.

The only plus for this hotel is it’s basically a footstep to the mall. That’s it. Other than that, do not consider spending your hard earn money on this hotel

text: Tuang bilik yang kemas
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: irfan lal
text:
My recent stay at Royale Chulan KL was a truly unforgettable experience. The hotel's grand, opulent lobby immediately set the tone for a luxurious stay. The staff were warm, welcoming, and incredibly attentive to my needs, making me feel right at home.

My room was a haven of comfort and style. The spacious layout, coupled with the impeccable cleanliness and modern amenities, made me feel truly pampered. The bed was a cloud-like oasis, ensuring a restful night's sleep.

The hotel's prime location was a major bonus, offering easy access to iconic landmarks like the Petronas Twin Towers and the vibrant Bukit Bintang district. The breakfast buffet was a feast for the senses, featuring a delectable array of local and international delicacies.

However, it was the exceptional service that truly elevated my experience. The staff's dedication to ensuring guest satisfaction was evident in every interaction. They went above and beyond to make my stay memorable, from providing thoughtful recommendations to anticipating my every need.

In conclusion, my stay at Royale Chulan KL was a truly unforgettable experience. The combination of luxurious accommodations, prime location, and impeccable service made it a standout choice for travelers seeking the finest in hospitality.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: I recently stayed at Hotel Royale Chulan, and while the hotel itself may show its age, its prime location and excellent service made for a delightful experience.The hotel's central location was a major selling point. It was within walking distance of many popular attractions, restaurants, and shopping areas. This convenience allowed me to explore the city easily without relying on public transportation.The staffs  were incredibly friendly and helpful. They were always willing to assist with my requests, from providing recommendations for local eateries to helping me arrange transportation. Their warm hospitality made me feel welcome and valued throughout my stay.While the hotel's decor and amenities may be a bit dated, they were still comfortable and functional. The rooms were clean and well-maintained, and the bed was cozy.Overall, I would recommend Hotel Royale Chulan to travelers seeking a classic hotel experience in a prime location. While it may not be the most modern option, its excellent service and convenient location make it a worthwhile choice.

name: Trip.com Member
text: 5박 예약, 1박 후 침대 문제로 방을 바꿨다. 한국어 하는 여직원 sasa씨가 친절하게 해 주었다 매우 감사. 조식은 좋다는 평이 많은데, 나는 묵언. 호텔위치 좋음. 호텔앞에서 직진 사거리에서 좌회전 조금 가다가 우회전 하면 KLCC공원 및 쌍둥이 빌딩 5~8분 소요. 야경 좋음. 파빌리온 쇼핑센터 호텔앞 좌회전 조금가면 육교건너서(무단횡단 위험) 바로, 숙소에서 보임 가까운 위치. 파빌리온 쇼핑센터 내부 관통하면 그 앞부터 부킷빈탕 번화가, 조금 더 가면 잘란야시장(낮에 방문해 보았는데 청결상태 불량 & 냄새, 바로 도망쳤음, 밤에는 안보여서 괜찮을까?). 이동수단은 그랩 이용, 너무 덥고 힘들어 부킷빈탕도 한번만 걷고, 두번째 부터는 그랩이용.(번화가는 교통체증이 심해 걷는거나 그랩이나  소요시간 비슷함) / 사족-식당 추천 Mee Tarik 체인점 구글 검색하면 곳곳에 있음, 2명이 먹으면 spicey 국수(마라탕+시큼한 국물)더위에 지쳤다면 강력추천, 양꼬치, 볶음밥 이렇게 3개 주문하면 환상의 조합. 테이블 있는 매운양념 통(다대기) 좋음. 여행 내내 하루에 한번 갔음.

name: Rubbery Sha
text:
Was skeptical before the stay based on the bad reviews.

Turns out that this hotel is really one of the lousiest I’ve stayed in Malaysia, considering the price point it’s charging.

When checking in, they offered me an upgrade, without me asking, and was told to return about 2 hours later. When I returned, they told me the upgrade was cancelled.

Room condition was really old and had so many issues. Even the toilet hook for hanging clothes was broken.

Requested for slight late checkout at 130pm and they granted it. When it was 1pm, the staff forced open my room and created a commotion as I had the door latch on. The receptionist calmly said that the housekeeping team are not aware, like it’s already a known problem.

Hotel staff could be friendlier. The porch security guards were the friendliest and most welcoming.

Overall below average. I won’t be making a return.
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Syed Arif Mohiuddin
text: Best
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Dr Arvind Bodhankar
text:
I must say, it was an exceptional experience! From the moment I arrived, the staff were warm and welcoming, making me feel right at home.
The hotel's grand lobby and beautifully decorated rooms exuded luxury and comfort. My room was spacious, clean, and equipped with all the modern amenities I needed. The bed was incredibly comfortable, ensuring a restful night's sleep.
The hotel's location was perfect, with easy access to major attractions like the Petronas Twin Towers and Bukit Bintang. The breakfast spread was impressive, offering a wide range of delicious options to suit every taste.
What truly stood out, however, was the exceptional service. The staff were attentive, friendly, and went above and beyond to ensure my stay was memorable.

title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 房间很大，值得推荐的是早餐，是住过的酒店里质量最好的，西式与马来 印度菜相结合，虽然房间旧一点，其他还不错
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Michael Kang
text:
룸 업글레이드를 해줬는데, 커넥티드룸이었음.
옆방 소리가 바로 옆에서 들림
밤에 너무 시끄러워서 잘 수 가 없음.
3박했는데, 결국 마지막날 밤 12시 넘어서 방 옮김.
옮긴 방도 옆방 소리는 다 들렸으나 전에 있던 방보다는 나았음.
시끄러워도 잘 자는 사람만 가세요.
숙박비가 싸고,방도 크고, 조식도 좋고, 위치도 좋은데,
사람이 잠을 자야 그 다음날 움직일텐데..
전반적으로 시설은 낙후되었고, 관리도 제대로 안되어 있음.
객실 청소도 엉망임. 안 쓰던 방을 준건지..
다음에 쿠알라룸푸르 갈 지 는 모르겠지만 가면 딴 호텔갈 듯
샤워기 필터는 필수임
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Shekar Sundaramurthy
text: Decent place - not much dining option other than breakfast. Walkable to big mall.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: all everything okay but when i leave my stuff in room after check out. staff not keep my stuff when i call to pick up
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: Food is fine, except restaurant close early around 10pm
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Eric Wong
text:
Basically it's in the shopping mall and the mall is interconnected to Kidszania, IKEA and Ikano Power Center.

Room price is affordable based on its location, it's clean and staffs is very helpful.

name: hashidah abdul razak
text: Very good clean hotel 5 min walk to the curve
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Trip.com Member
text: The room is great, at an affordable price. Lots of places to eat since the Hotel is attached to the mall. The only downside is, the parking, they don't have free parking or flat rate parking, since they shared the parking with the mall. So if you have to go in go out frequently, you'll be charged with quite a sum.
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Trip.com Member
text: Plesant Stay. The choices of breakfast need to be varies.
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Trip.com Member
text: Great service, friendly and helpful staff. Room service is very attentive. Had a good stay here.

name: Trip.com Member

name: Trip.com Member

title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Trip.com Member
text: Terbaik dah hotel ni..parking pn senang cuma kena bayar je..ruangan menunggu pun ade kt ba*****t
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Trip.com Member
text: The breakfast menu need to be updated, same menu for past 3 days I’m stay there .
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Trip.com Member
text: Stay for 2 nights.Overalls is fine. Location is very good near to mall, KidZania.as well MRT STATION
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Trip.com Member
text: Old setup, looks like the rooms are from the 90’s, very basic. Super convenient to get food and walk the malls!
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Atanu Halder
text: The hotel location is good. Pool is also decent. Need to replace the floor carpets in the room. But it’s fair enough for the price we pay. Washroom has different partitions for loo and shower but the door of the loo was not closing properly for the room we were accommodated. When coming to breakfast yes you will find some Indian food like Parota, Dal, Dosa, Idly, Wada, Poha, Khichdi, Curd rice. All the items for breakfast are prepared on rotational menu.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 去吉隆坡，在民宿酒店之間選了這家位於中心區域的老牌酒店，酒店外型及大堂充滿東南亞風味，很有感覺。到達後辦理入住之後英文服務也很快搞定上房，抵達房間樓層馬上感受到其他網友說的老舊感，到達房間後，很東南亞感的感覺，可是地毯很久了，還有破損處處，最離譜地燈插座居然脫落，床上被子有人類毛髮，感覺很是嘔心🤢，廁所有豪華感但也有點破損感了，這家酒店確實非常多本國和印度等地區人，華人比較小。早餐如其他所言算不錯了，基本本地特色的都有，偏印度但味道很不錯，地道。其他酒店游泳池還不錯人小，遊了一下也很舒服，整體服務南亞地區來講都算不錯了。飯店地點是一流了，去什麼肉骨茶亞羅街水族館和雙子塔都可以步行到達，附近百盛商場和逛街地方很多很近，很適合城市深度遊，除了要接受一下衛生和舊的問題以性價比對比附近區域來講還是可以推薦入住。
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 호텔 시설은 많이 낙후되었습니다. 하지만 침구류의 청결도는 괜찮았습니다. 다음에 기회가 되면 또 이용하겠습니다.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Malaysian Diaries
text: Class hotel with all kind of stay for a family.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Ranga C
text: Good
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: Tq for nice environment
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 房间宽敞、干静，外出方便，离大型购物广场很近，吃的也多，下次还会入住！
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Cat Wang
text:
i never had review to any hotel. But this one is what I have to leave the review.
The location is good. Downtown area.
The first room toilet leakage, the engineer was super nice and helped me to fix it, but after 5 min he left, toilet leakage is back.
I requested to change the room at 8:50pm, the reception asked me to wait for a while. Someone will come to my room to help me. Until 945pm, no one came here, no one contacted me at all. I went to the reception, reception checked with another person, and that person told me the hotel is fully occupied, someone was checking the room. Hardly believe the checking can last for 1 hours without anyone giving me a heads up. It is 945pm and I still need to work very early next morning.
I changed the room, the second room aircon is not working well. Only can adjust the wind, but temperature is not adjustable.
I understand the facility is old, sometimes need maintain and fix it. But I can’t believe that is the service for 5 star hotel.
Won’t choose this hotel anymore, and not recommend to stay.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: aisha jaffer
text:
Hotel is clean and has good amenities. Great location, 15 minute walk from Petronas Towers and Jalan Alor Street. This is the best thing about the hotel.

Could be a Malaysia wide thing where the toilets are just not as strong as the UK ones. The toilet didn't flush properly though- hotel staff checked it but couldn't fix it.

The mirror in the hotel room is far from the socket and so I couldn't dry my hair with the hairdryer properly.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 吉隆坡皇家朱蘭酒店，位置在柏威年廣場附近，走路5-10分鐘就能逛街，飯店有附早餐，早餐大多數是印度料理及麵包、沙拉等等，中式料理較少，房務服務很好，有任何需求反應都能得到解決，飯店有游泳池健身房，但旅遊時間安排沒有使用到，外觀看起來不錯，房價在周遭算是便宜，整體的體驗cp值良好
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: Service terbaik.bilik besar dan cantik
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 老五星级酒店，马来风格，服务很好，早餐品种不多够吃，入住和离开办理都很迅速，胜在便宜，地图上看离柏威年商场很近，实际走起来要绕一大圈，要走15分钟，热水有，卫生过得去 。唯一一点不好：老黑太多了！全是印度人老黑，和沙发同色！
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 来开会，会议指定酒店，没想到房间超级大，90平方米，有厨房里面冰箱 微波炉 灶具啥都有。大套间。早餐也非常棒！游泳池也很好！
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 治安不好 衛生不佳 不推薦
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: ghazi faisal
text: Good place very near to city center
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 值得推荐的店，虽然没有中文服务，有时候没有热水，但是逛街真的很方便，就在旁边酒店人行天桥直达柏威年。闹中取静的位置，非常舒服。类似于长沙的国金中心到都正街的位置
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 酒店是吉隆坡老五星级酒店，没有中文服务，但是从前台到服务员都随身有翻译APP，服务很热情。可能没有中文服务的原因，在携程上点评不高，我觉得还是可以推荐的，首先，地理位置非常好，就在柏威年的后面，从隔壁酒店天桥直达柏威年商场内，不管多晚，又方便又安全其次，早餐丰盛，面包特别好吃，牛奶咖啡特别好喝，当然，由于印度人居多，印度菜居多，可以不吃，也可以尝试着吃。房间比较大，带阳台，楼下有个游泳池，房间还比较安静。反应一个问题:偶尔会在晚上用水高峰期没有热水
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: We were very disappointed. We booked a non cancellable room two months before. A few days before we arrived we advised that we may arrive late. The hotel informed that rooms will be allocated based on availability. I said that I wanted the Premier King room that I had booked and nothing less. They again replied that allocation depends on availability when we arrive. Anyway, turns out we got the room type we wanted albeit with zero view. We looked onto a broken tiled roof. Room size was okay but not the advertised 40sq metres. No bath mat, no hand towels, no bath robes, dirty carpet, dirty pillow case that smelled like it was not replaced, poorly maintained furniture. I tried calling reception but the room phone was not working. I requested the missing items that were then provided. Regarding the phone not working, reception merely said oh yeah the phones on that side of your floor were not working. The next day the bath mat was again not replaced. I requested one and they sent a torn mat. I also informed the cleaner about a nail sticking out of the carpet and that I had stepped on it. He told me to inform maintenance. Seriously! I have to try to contact maintenance? On our third day we arrived back to the hotel at 10pm to find that the room had not been cleaned. We went to reception who said they will get housekeeping. After waiting a short while I said I would rather check out and go to another hotel than to wait for housekeeping. Then they called the manager who said that since I had booked non cancellable it may be difficult to get a refund and even if he could manage to get a refund for us it may take a month or more. ! He said he could give me another room. I didn't see why I should now have to pack my stuff at almost 11pm and move to another room. He said we'll he is offering me a suite and will have the porters help us move. At this point I just wanted to leave and even forget about any refund for what would be our last night at the Royale Chulan. However, leaving would still me packing up and then having to find another hotel at close to midnight. This situation was really stressful. Finally we decided to just accept another room at the same hotel. I must admit, the suite room was really nice albeit that the bedsheet was dirty and had to be replaced. Man! We will never go back there and will advise others against staying at the Royale Chulan. They hold themselves out to be 5 stars but are not even 3 stars in my opinion. By the way, we spoke to some staff who told us that there were many complaints about housekeeping.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 出发前看携程的点评，点评分数并不高，评论也并不好，但是看到地理位置到柏威年非常近，再比较了一下周边的价格，再看了一下照片，壮着胆子订了两晚，从服务到早餐，感觉还是可以的，性价比还是很高的，周边的酒店要这个价格这个环境，应该很难了。又加了两晚。
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 넓은 숙소로 여러 가지 면에서 만족스러운 호텔이었습니다. 특히 가격이 괜찮았구요 다시 1번 머물고 싶습니다. 그렇습니다.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: lee wan Lian
text: 以木为主的设计，好漂亮。
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 性价比高的酒店，四百多。双子塔不远，也安静，有游泳池等。大厅很大，早餐很丰富，出行方便。
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: Good stay and comfortable
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: Terbaik dan bersih.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: The only two highlights were the location and breakfast. Other than that, paint falling off walls, smelly carpets, holes in chairs in rooms, no face towels in rooms, housekeeping indicator broken and got no housekeeping… just to name a few.Booked two rooms. One had no safety box, and the one I found in the other room was locked. Asked for help twice over the phone, and both times made me wait in the room for 20 minutes (we then left rooms for meals) and no one ever came. Expressed my complaint for the above while I went to the reception to use the safety box at the front desk, and a manager looking guy told me loud and clear that NONE of the safety boxes in the rooms worked and ALL are BROKEN. I said, in that case, why didn’t you tell me at the first place instead of making me wait for help that never came!?  And that gentleman questioned me if I understood English!? Very disrespectful, dude. I did not at all make any assumptions on your English abilities based your Malaysian look.If you are considering this hotel, stay elsewhere.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: i had a very great and pleasant stay heree loved it no complains but as we want to check out the lift is not moving so got scared for a moment but we just press the open button and its open then we use other lift. everything else is great will repeat again soon
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 好好住啊。
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 房间设施比较陈旧，床单居然有个破洞。好在位置不错，出行方便。旁边有个地铁站。酒店房间特别多，入住的客人也多。从酒店后面出去步行15分钟有永兴城茶餐市和海脚人餐厅，可以去尝一尝。酒店离柏威联和百盛购物中心很近。酒店外面的地铁一个站就可以到达双峰塔。
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 房间设施旧，但是性价比好。酒店大堂比较气派。酒店离市中心近，去哪里都很方便，酒店早餐不错值得推荐旅游入住。
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: What else I need to complain ? Nothing. Everything is very good with the price given. The amenities and the room is very clean and satisfactory. Our room's view is the pool which is very nice. Will repeat it again for sure.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 我们是接近凌晨到达的。办理入住比较快，但是房间很一般，微波炉是坏的，提供的毛巾也是破旧的。但是性价比较好，出行比较方便，离百威廉购物中心很近。酒店出门右边是地铁站。
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: Beautiful hotel, clean, very comfortable and very close to the mall, Beautiful hotel, clean, very comfortable and very close to the mall. Good & delicious breakfast.
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Trip.com Member
text: Location & Amenities:We loved the hotel's location. It's conveniently connected to the mall, making everything easily accessible by foot. The restaurant was also fantastic, offering a wide variety of cuisines, from Western dishes to local specialties.Parking:The only downside was the parking service. While the cost is reasonable at less than RM10 for 24 hours, it's still inconvenient and can affect the overall vacation experience. We believe the hotel management and The Curve should consider offering complimentary parking or more flexible options for their hotel guests to enhance their stay.
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Terry Soomc
text:
Very nic
e and comfortable hotel stay. The location is good with a train station nearby. Shopping and dining are easily accessible.
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: nabilah kamil
text: As my key room got problem and 1 hr to settle it
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Trip.com Member
text: Second time here. Location location location.First time we booked 2 rooms, requested for connecting rooms. However we were given a so called family room (1 bed room apartment, living room turned into a bedroom), layout was poor and we had to share the bathroom!Second time, we stayed as we had to attend a night wedding near the hotel. We were given the room facing e-curve. It was noisy with music until 10pm as e-Curve was having food festival. The room was smelly, most prob due to sewere or water leakage from the old pipping.
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

Foods are ok but  Coffee machine dont work and staff running away from responsibility. They would push one another when guests are asking. And they let guests queuing for the machine even though it is not working!

title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Hock Lye, Khaleel, CHAN
text: The last time I stayed here was more than 10 years ago. It’s a lot more busier and well connected now, with more hotels, shopping malls, restaurants and the MRT. Hence, it’s pleasant that there more amenities and activities while staying here for 4 days, the hotel is dated. it’s well maintained but furniture and fittings are worn out with obvious marks of repair and mending. Staff are friendly. While the hotel rates are reasonable, you have choices of cheaper or better hotels in the vicinity. Hence, I felt a bit pushed when they charge for basic request like a twin room, amenities.
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Tasha Ong
text:
The only good thing about this hotel is the location. The room was acceptable for a night’s stay; old, some things like lamp, and the lighting in the wardrobe fell apart. Wasn’t very clean either.

The buffet breakfast is terrible. I bite into a broccoli that was filled with sand! Not only that, lots of empty tray (I went at 9am ish). Also, the roti canai tastes sour, chewy, and took the cook forever to make! The muffins they offered are like in neon green, and pink colour. The greens in the noodle stall is not fresh. So awful. Also, the wait staff are not attentive at all.

Please, change your head chef. Bad taste, lack of management and care.
title: Royale Chulan The Curve

name: Trip.com Member
text: 位置好，老牌酒店古色古香！
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Asyraf bin Arsad
text: Hadir sebab ada program. Layanan dan makanan sangat bagus.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Nishant Srivastava
text:
Hotel royal chulan kualalampur Malaysia, is good place to stay with family or solo ...centrally located ..lots of shopping options nearby ...lots of Indian restaurants also available nearby ..rates are also reasonable..
Great place to stay and enjoy for budget traveller's good place for shopping as well

Enjoy
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: Such a wonderful experience!  Way beyond 'service with a smile'! Suite was perfectly fresh and clean. Wonderful breakfast though missing the days when Korea and Japan foods were at the buffet .  And BYOB executive lounge happy hour was one best..the only other best for Happy Hour since the pandemic is Renaissance Riverside in HCMC.  Only things missing were TVs the appropriate size for their large spacious rooms. And Taxis..no waiting taxis. Grab only
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: I enjoyed stay at the Hotel Royale Chulan. The location was strategic, the staff was friendly & the facilities were great. Overall, I recommended this hotel to anyone looking for fantastic experience.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 多次预定了，出行方便，酒店环境不错，早餐也很丰盛

text: 房间很大，地段也很好，去哪里都方便。

title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: Not our first time staying at the hotel. We especially like the location which is a short walk to Pavilion plus breakfast spread is quite extensive and delicious. The room is clean and well maintained even though furnishings are quite dated. We also experienced very low water pressure with hardly any hot water in the evening. I hope this can be resolved as we would lile to consider staying here again in the future.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: - Masuk lobby bau sedap wangi- Breakfast sedap byk pilihan- Staff friendly
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Han Seol
text: We book double room but we got free upgrade to Premium Suite. Nice place to healing. Breakfast is good but nothing to hype. Swimming pool is full with kids so adults better go to gym. The only thing that I really recommend is you don't have to drive here, drop to MRT Conlay and 5 minutes walk you're in their lobby.
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: Staycation one night with my small family (1 toddler & 1 baby).Check in was very late process about 20 minutes by the receptionist. Entered the room (no.337) and feel eerie / goosebumps with the room itself as i found big whole garlic behind TV cabinet. The bedsheet was slightly dirty with blood stained. Around 12.15 a.m., there’s sound made at TV area and kids became so tantrum. Breakfast was good and pool also was nice with not so cold water for kids but slightly dirty. Regretful to stay here as I thought it will be enjoyable trip due to celebrating my confinement ended and to make my toodler happy with this short trip. This hotel requires a major revamp of renovation and maintenance for hotel sustainability in the future as it has wise location for tourist spot!
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur

name: Trip.com Member
text: 第一次住五星酒店床单是破洞的，牙刷没有刷就掉毛
title: Royale Chulan Kuala Lumpur
